programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rock-a-Bye Bounty
programme.desc: Dog and Beth must go after their former housekeeper, Lisa, who's jumped bond. They know this case will be tricky because Lisa knows everyone in the family. Luckily, Beth's nephew, Jason, is visiting and is quickly put to work as the bait.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Father-Hood
programme.desc: Before Tim heads out for a tough day of bounty hunting, he likes to get in a little quality time with his daughter, Summer Rain.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cops and Criminals
programme.desc: After giving a rousing speech to an audience of enthusiastic grade-schoolers, Dog catches up with an old friend, Sheriff Tommy Cayetano, to talk business. Dog's got a tough fugitive, named Mia, to catch and Tommy is happy to lend a hand.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cupid in Cuffs
programme.desc: It's the day before Valentine's Day and love is in the air at Da Kine Bail Bonds--but not for Tapi who has failed to appear in court on theft charges. Dog's plan is to have Leland knock on Tapi's door with a Valentine's gift to draw her out.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bonds of Love
programme.desc: Dog and Beth are finally getting married! They've been together for more than ten years but Dog is determined, as he puts it, to "marry his common law wife the Christian way."

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: To Love and to Cherish
programme.desc: Dog and Beth are off to the Big Island for their wedding. They hope to relax for a few days but it turns out Leland has a fugitive he needs to catch and despite the time limit, neither Dog nor Beth can resist the opportunity to catch a fugitive.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bustin' with Justin
programme.desc: Dog and the team must deal with misleading informants, belligerent boaters, and angry drunks when they go after Kimberly, a traffic offender with over 20 violations. And if that isn't enough, Dog has another problem - Duane Lee is sick.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Run Fugitive, Run
programme.desc: When the team hunts for Steven, a fugitive with a history of domestic abuse, they seek help from his girlfriend, who's been a victim of his abuse. Meanwhile, Beth trains for a 5K race to help raise awareness about domestic abuse.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Vegas or Bust
programme.desc: Dog is going to be the keynote speaker at the annual Profession Bail Agents convention in Las Vegas, but before he leaves he's got to clear two cases from his docket - Heidi and Stephanie.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Playing Possum
programme.desc: Tim's got a big problem. Owen has failed to appear in court. He's on bond for serious drug charges and now Tim could lose $30,000 if he doesn't catch Owen. With Dog's help he tries to track down the co-signer but they come up dry.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rainy Day Woman
programme.desc: It's been raining for days and the team is going a little stir crazy, but Dog has the cure; a good hunt. Maui has failed to appear on a drug charge and the team has just one lead. She was recently spotted during a bust at a local chop shop garage.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Ticket to Ride
programme.desc: Dog decides it's time to outfit the Da Kine crew with new SUVs. After a quick visit to their local dealership, they go after Jasmine, a woman whose criminal record includes over 37 arrests for everything from drug promotion to assault.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mother Knows Best
programme.desc: Dog has two fugitives to catch, and he gets help from the unlikeliest sources - the fugitives' mothers. First, Ginger's mother wants to revoke her daughter's bond. Then, Brandon's mother decides to revoke his bond because Brandon has an ice habit.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack Draft
programme.desc: When the Robertsons participate in the West Monroe Fire Department pancake breakfast, the firemen invite Willie and his brothers to train with the department for the day. Meanwhile, Phil and Si accompany Miss Kay on a trip to visit a family grave.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Brand of Brothers
programme.desc: When Willie contemplates re-branding the Duck Commander image, Jase takes issue with having an outsider design their image, so he and the guys create their own new logo and business cards. Meanwhile, Willie and Phil help Bella with her science project.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: De-Bug Life
programme.desc: The guys realize it is time for the annual cleaning of the duck blinds when they come across a gator using one as a home. Meanwhile, while the kids are running the church car wash, Si and Willie disagree on the best way to draw in customers.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Men vs. Wild
programme.desc: Brotherly competition is taken to a whole new level when Jase and Willie challenge Alan and Jep to a survival race through the woods on Phil's property. Meanwhile, Si is interested in finding a new hobby when he sees Kay cutting coupons.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Return of the Beavers
programme.desc: When Phil discovers more beaver activity on the Robertson land, he recruits Jase, Jep, and Si to get rid of them. Meanwhile, Willie and Korie bring Bella to her first day of karate practice.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Stumped on a way to celebrate Willie's birthday, Korie enlists the guys' help and Jase takes the reigns in planning a trip to the lake where Phil and Kay used to live. Meanwhile, the women realize a raccoon is inside the lake house.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Glory Is the Reward of Mallard
programme.desc: When Willie takes a business trip to Scotland to expand his duck call business, he brings the entire family along so they can reconnect with their Scottish roots. Willie organizes a bus tour to trace his family heritage.
programme.sub-title: Glory Is the Reward of Mallard

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Night and Good Duck
programme.desc: A special holiday episode of Duck Dynasty shows when the Robertson family took over the Thanksgiving special of a local TV show "Good Morning Arklamiss." Each family member presents a special holiday segment, with Willie and Jase serving as anchormen.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack in the Saddle
programme.desc: When Willie becomes the temporary owner of a thoroughbred, he and the guys take it to a local track and enter it into a race. Meanwhile, when Kay decides she wants to buy a new birdbath for her yard, she recruits Phil, Martin and Godwin.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: The Robertsons help a long time employee whose Mom has fallen on hard times by buying her a brand new house for Christmas. Jep, Jase, Martin and Godwin race to finish a deck in time for the big reveal, only to get sidetracked by a hammering competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Cannonball Runs
programme.desc: Jase enters an outhouse race to help promote Willie's Duck Diner, but when the Robertsons show up for the race, they face an unexpected rival - Phillip McMillan. Meanwhile, Willie attempts to create the world's greatest bologna sandwich.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Mo Math, Mo Problems
programme.desc: Willie helps Sadie with her homework by enlisting the guys to create a real-life version of a math problem, but when Jase and Willie get sidetracked helping Sadie, they rekindle an old argument of whether Jase can outrun a truck.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Coop! There It Is!
programme.desc: When Jep asks Willie and the guys to help move his old chicken coop into his new house, which is under renovation, Jessica takes issue with its appearance, leading the guys to yet another project - renovating the chicken coop.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Friday Afternoon Lights
programme.desc: When Willie becomes an assistant coach on Lil' Will's struggling football team, his authority is tested when the kids challenge the adults to a scrimmage. Meanwhile, Kay brings Jep and Si to an aquarobics class at a local health club.

programme.title: American Hoggers: When Push Comes to Shove
programme.desc: Still smoking after being overlooked to run the family business, Krystal tries to prove she's more qualified than her brother but Robert doesn't take well to having his newfound authority challenged.

programme.title: American Hoggers: I Hate a Calf Killer
programme.desc: Robert's newfound leadership comes into question when he sleeps in on a big job, so Krystal takes the reigns and leads by example.

programme.title: American Hoggers: If You Want Something Done Right
programme.desc: When the power-struggle between Robert and Krystal starts to affect the bottom line, Jerry has no choice but to take control and finish the job before calf-eating hogs run a rancher out of business.
programme.sub-title: If You Want Something Done Right

programme.title: American Hoggers: Best Laid Plans
programme.desc: With his family fighting and business faltering, Jerry tries to mend some fences with a road trip to Louisiana, where wild hogs threaten a turtle farmer. .

programme.title: American Hoggers: Old Dog New Tricks
programme.desc: After sinking in the Louisiana swamps, Jerry recruits a local named "Leprechaun" for help, but catching hogs is only half the battle as Jerry struggles to keep peace in the family.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Family Matters
programme.desc: When a wild hog threatens some local children, even Jerry's wife, Cathy, gets involved in the hunt and in the process, the Campbells put the 'family' back in business... all according to Jerry's 'master plan.'

programme.title: American Hoggers: Nemesis
programme.desc: With his family working like a well-oiled machine, Jerry goes after a big contract offered up by a local car dealer.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Up the Creek
programme.desc: With Ronnie Creek and his crew breathing down the Campbells' necks, it's going to take a full team effort to win the big contract they're all after.

programme.title: American Hoggers: New Recruit
programme.desc: With Krystal's thumb injury sidelining her for 4-6 weeks, Robert tries to find a replacement, but family tensions resurface when he recruits a girl with zero experience.

programme.title: American Hoggers: Ranger Come Home
programme.desc: After another new recruit fails to make the cut, the Campbells recognize Krystal is irreplaceable and take another job despite being shorthanded.

programme.title: Deadliest Journeys: Brazil
programme.desc: In this episode, we follow the river dwellers like 14 year old Jesse, who row for hours a day, risking death trying to fasten his tiny canoes onto the fast moving tourist boats. The children hope to earn a few pennies for their family.

programme.title: Deadliest Journeys: Mexico
programme.desc: In this episode, we follow Jaime and Lupita, two young Salvadorians desperate to make it to the US. Theirs is an emotional rollercoaster, full of hope and fear, as they dodge border police, brave robbers and rapists and face the journey's hardships.

programme.title: Deadliest Journeys: Congo River
programme.desc: We make the epic journey from Kinshasha, capital of the DRC, to Kisangani, the third largest city in this vast country. The only way to move between the cities is by boat or plane. We join 1,500 people onboard the 'Gbemani'.

programme.title: Deadliest Journeys: Argentina
programme.desc: A dairy farmer drives his Mad Max style lorry - half bus, half tractor - through swamped lagoons to deliver his farm's milk.

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: Screwing the Pooch
programme.desc: It's a real shaggy dog story. Shaneequa loved her precious pet pooch Fendy but when she could no longer care for her she found a friend that could. But where oh where has the little dog gone? Now find out who winds up in the dog house.

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: The Reunion of Swag Kids
programme.desc: It's music biz mayhem when two men tangle over their boy band. But when the music stopped, these grown men fought like little boys. Was it a record label rip-off? Don't miss the bombshell that blows this boy band open.

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: Clash of the Cousins
programme.desc: First, these cousins clash over cash then they spar over cars, and finally, they moan over loans. Can they find a middle ground or will this family keep feuding?

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: Gross Misconduct
programme.desc: Did their office friendship go too far? Or is she making up his sexual misconduct to avoid making up what she owes?

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: Turning Her Freak Off
programme.desc: Before Pablo was Stephanie's ex, their relationship was all about the sex. But her change in hormones made him moan. Now he's wondering if it's her sexual appetite, or her, that’s gone away.

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: Bonzo and the Hound Dog
programme.desc: Michael, a clown, and Elvis Presley impersonator is suing his talent agent for unpaid dues. Jason claims he was never paid by the clients because Michael showed up drunk and insulted the kids.

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: Fish and Hammer
programme.desc: Best friends Earl and Demoun brawl over stolen sushi. But when Demoun put away his fist, he took out his hammer, smashing Earl's TV and car window. But he claims he was justified because Earl instigated the situation.

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: Ya Booze Ya Lose
programme.desc: Amanda is suing her former best friend for the return of thousands of dollars for everything from a car, to jail, to hair care. Bernardo says he doesn't owe her anything because she helped him out from the goodness of her heart.

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: Relationship Renovations
programme.desc: A kitchen renovation between siblings is a recipe for disaster. Ronald and Rhonda stuck together during the toughest of times but when he brought his best to the kitchen table it brought out their worst.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Angry Man
programme.desc: Kadaveion and Justice’s anger issues are tearing them apart. Kadaveion doubts he fathered their baby, but Justice says he’s a liar who gave her a STD and is ready to leave him. Can Judge Toler find a solution or have they already made up their minds?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Done Done
programme.desc: Nichele says Stewart would pay the neighbors to spy on her. She says he was never supportive when it came to parenting. Stewart says Nichele has always denied cheating on him but he believes in his heart she did.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Family Guy
programme.desc: Jazmin's final straw was when Darren brought another woman over and lied about Jazmin being his sister and his daughter being his niece. Darren feels he's a good father who pays the bills and doesn't need to answer to anyone if he's not married.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Blame It on the Sun
programme.desc: When Milton came into Sona’s life, all the stars were aligned but now their relationship has been out of orbit. Sona is a firm believer in astrology and zodiac signs, but this Leo can no longer tolerate the cheating ways of Milton who is an Aries.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Blame It on the Alcohol
programme.desc: Nikkinba says Muriel is controlling and constantly breaking his phones. He wouldn't return Muriel's calls for days until he quit his job and said that he's leaving her to live in North Carolina. Can they settle down or will he buy a one-way ticket?

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: When Life Gives You A Lemon
programme.desc: A car sale between coworkers started off sour, then turned bitter, and ended with a sweet old lady.
programme.sub-title: When Life Gives You A Lemon

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: He Said She Said
programme.desc: Two siblings go toe to toe and tell two totally different stories. Reunited after years apart, the battle begins again.

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: Gambling the Friendship
programme.desc: Daryl is suing his former friend for missing belongings that he believes were sold to fuel Rashain's gambling addiction. Rashain claims that they live in a bad neighborhood and the items were stolen.

programme.title: Clubbing Experience - Series 4: Pawsa - Solid Grooves Stage @ We Are Fstvl 2019
programme.desc: Watch a rare vinyl set by Pawsa on his own Solid Grooves stage at We Are Fstvl in Upminster. Pawsa’s signature sound, inventive tech house with an old school vide, is made for the dance-floor.
programme.sub-title: Pawsa - Solid Grooves Stage @ We Are Fstvl 2019

programme.title: Clubbing Experience: Dasha Rush (live) @ Big Bang Festival 2018
programme.desc: The woman and the machines, not your ordinary hype business techno artist. Armed with her TR-909 and other gears Dasha gave an impeccable live performance at Big Bang Festival! Magnified by the industrial stage design, this is for techno lovers!

programme.title: Clubbing Experience - Series 3: Wade - Elrow @ Amnesia Ibiza
programme.desc: Wade was closing the terrace at Amnesia Ibiza for Elrow!

programme.title: Clubbing Experience: Ibranovski @ Nameless Music Festival
programme.desc: Relive the set of Ibranovski on the main stage a Nameless Music Festival in Barzio, Italy! Do you know what Ghetto Mainstream means? Ibranovski will show you!

programme.title: Clubbing Experience: Matthias Tanzmann - Elrow @ Amnesia Ibiza
programme.desc: Get your dose of confettis and techno with Matthias Tanzmann at Elrow - Amnesia Ibiza!

programme.title: Clubbing Experience: The Bloody Beetroots @ Nameless Music Festival
programme.desc: Whoop Whoop! The Bloody Beetroots versus our video crane at Nameless Music Festival? What can go wrong? Relive the incredible set of The Bloody Beetroots at Nameless Music Festival!
programme.sub-title: The Bloody Beetroots @ Nameless Music Festival

programme.title: Clubbing Experience - Series 3: KLYMVX - Best of French by DJ Mag France @ Zigzag club Paris
programme.desc: Back to the Best of French by DJ Mag France party at Zig Zag Club Paris. The duet KLYMVX was playing some good records!
programme.sub-title: KLYMVX - Best of French by DJ Mag France @ Zigzag club Paris

programme.title: Hypnotic Visuals: Hypnotic Visuals II
programme.desc: Evolving motion art for the 'late night' state of mind

programme.title: Fashion Edge
programme.desc: High energy fashion world getaway

programme.title: Shades of Blue
programme.desc: Gorgeous, calming hues of blue… positively energy

programme.title: Places I've Never Been
programme.desc: Dreamy travel photography, cityscapes & faraway places

programme.title: Epic Landscapes
programme.desc: Picturesque, ethereal landscapes of faraway places

programme.title: Surreal/Psychedelic: Surreal/Psychedelic I
programme.desc: Where dreams and reality collide

programme.title: Happy Hour: Happy Hour II
programme.desc: Vivid imagery for an amped up, festive atmosphere

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Dark Chocolate
programme.desc: Sandra tries misleads Philip about where she's going and whom she's going with.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: A Lamb To Slaughter
programme.desc: Leah and Jeremy learn that Philip and Sandra have left the facility without their knowledge or their permission.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Hard Decisions
programme.desc: Sandra confronts Philip about snitching to their parents.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Mary Jane
programme.desc: Cora is concerned about what Vinny is growing in the back yard. Mr. Brown begins to act weird after burning Vinny's plants that he cut down. (S1, ep13)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: A Huge Debt
programme.desc: Sandra tricks Philip into thinking she's going to the bathroom when she has other plans. Leah tries tracking Sandra's phone when she comes up missing. (S1, ep14)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Defiance
programme.desc: Cora calls Sheriff Luckett about Sandra running off with his son. Jeremy and Leah confront Sandra when she returns home and Sandra responds disrespectfully. (S1, ep15)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Rebel With A Cause
programme.desc: Jeremy and Leah have different ideas about how they should address Sandra's behaviour. Sheriff Luckett stops by to have a talk with Jeremy about their kids. (S1, ep16)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: The Talk
programme.desc: Sandra overhears her parents role-playing their strategy for the next time they talk to her. Leah asks Cora to step in. Sandra responds to the most unlikely motivator. (S1, ep17)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Add More Color
programme.desc: Mr. Brown gives Sandra advice on how to get what she wants and her outfit for school. Sandra apologises to her parents. Leah grows concerned with Sandra's sudden change of heart. (S1, ep18)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: The Brown Bomber
programme.desc: Mr. Brown becomes anxious to open the assisted living facility. Everyone becomes concerned when Mr. Brown tries to drum up business before they're ready to open. (S1, ep19)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Open For Business
programme.desc: Mr. Brown's live video about the facility goes viral. Lindor offers to be a helping hand around the living facility. Philip brings attention to Lindor's enormous appetite. (S1, ep20)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Being A Good Citizen
programme.desc: Mr. Brown tells Leah what Cora thinks about her cooking. Leah and Cora become concerned about Lindor's behaviour. Cora tries to convince Mr.Brown the facility will need a nurse. (S1, ep21)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: To Trust Or Not To Trust
programme.desc: Jeremy and Leah have reason to finally be confident about their decision to move. Sandra has a change of heart concerning Lindor, and her parents want to know why. (S1, ep22)
programme.sub-title: To Trust Or Not To Trust

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: A Fight For Honor
programme.desc: Jeremy and Leah are infuriated after learning what Sheriff Luckett has done to Sandra. Mr. Brown takes on the responsibility of preparing dinner for the kids. (S1, ep23)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: A Dangerous Situation
programme.desc: Cora tries to convince Mr. Brown to pitch in and help get Jeremy out of jail. Jeremy and Leah have a conversation with Sandra about invading her privacy. (S1, ep24)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: The Dirty Denial
programme.desc: Vinny is in an unusually good mood and causes everyone concern. Plans to open the living facility come to a halt when Vinny receives disturbing news. (S1, ep25)

programme.title: Paranormal State: First Contact
programme.desc: Washington State, a hotbed of unexplained paranormal activity. Between possible UFOs in the sky and winged creatures in the woods, Ryan and his team are forced to face their fears and deal with the question: Are we truly alone in the universe?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Vendetta
programme.desc: P.R.S. investigates claims of supernatural revenge in the Pennsylvania Poconos. When a client's new boyfriend moves in, does the paranormal move in with him? Or did her ex put a hex on her house and the entire family?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dwelling of the Dead
programme.desc: A single mom claims she is being physically assaulted by a spirit in her Kentucky home. Ryan first explores a natural explanation for the alleged phenomena. But the client's five-year-old son also sees spirits, and his sightings appear to line up.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Ladder
programme.desc: A large family in Shrewsbury, MA, has been living with a spirit for the last 40 years. To most of the siblings, the entity is menacing and evil, but Sandy seems to have a different connection.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Devil in Syracuse
programme.desc: The clients are new, but the spirit is all too familiar as Ryan Buell prepares himself to battle the taunting demon that has been following him.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dead Legends
programme.desc: PRS and Psychic/Medium Chip Coffey investigate the famed Hotel Conneaut in northern Pennsylvania. Heavy doors opening on their own, sightings of a boy, a bride and a menacing butcher have the hotel's staff on edge.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Shadow Caster
programme.desc: PRS investigates an Alabama home where clients, Georgiana and her two daughters, are so terrified, they moved out after only 18 months. They have seen shadow figures, been touched and have a recorded EVP stating, "Look at me, get out of here."

programme.title: Paranormal State: Satan's Soldier
programme.desc: Mark and Kim can't sleep through the racket caused by unseen forces in their central Indiana home. When PRS and Psychic/Medium Michelle Belanger discover what appears to be blood in the basement, they investigate a history of violence in the home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Woman in the Window
programme.desc: Ryan and his team lend paranormal assistance to a family who lives in a historic home that was once a part of the Underground Railroad. Does the answer to their haunting lie in the mysterious tunnels beneath the house?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Hide and Seek
programme.desc: Hillary and her nine-year-old son Hunter are being harassed by a shadow presence in their Victorian home in Newburgh, Indiana. Trap doors in the basement reveal artifacts from a bygone era, and the clients have recorded persistent strange noises.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Pet Cemetery
programme.desc: Ryan and his team investigate the bizarre haunting of a woman and her dog in Waterboro, Maine. The Labrador was chewing at her own fur and standing on guard on the bed, growling at unseen figures.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Sickness
programme.desc: Something is making Lisa and her family sick. Is it natural or paranormal? Ryan and the team uncover the tragic history surrounding Lisa's home--with shocking connections to respiratory illness.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Sixth Sense
programme.desc: A worried mother calls the Paranormal Research Society to help her son Matthew, a boy who sees dead people. Matthew's story strikes a chord with team leader Ryan Buell who also experienced paranormal activity as a child.

programme.title: Paranormal State: I Am Six
programme.desc: Laura has felt oppressed by a violent spirit ever since she heard a chilling EVP in the fall of 2007. The 26-year-old claims she's been beaten, choked, even forcibly submerged.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Drakelow Tunnels
programme.desc: The team investigates the tunnels beneath Drakelow Hill in Worcestershire that once housed a WWII factory and then a Cold War command complex.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Saltmarshe Hall - Part 1
programme.desc: The Most Haunted team is invited to investigate Saltmarshe Hall near Goole, East Yorkshire. Particular attention is paid to investigating the abandoned north wing of the house, shut up for 70 years.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Saltmarshe Hall - Part 2
programme.desc: The owners of Saltmarshe Hall present the Most Haunted team with a unique opportunity to investigate inside a recently-discovered, sealed-up part of the building.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Athelhampton House
programme.desc: Athelhampton Hall dates back to the Middle Ages. It had fallen into disrepair but has since been restored. Derek connects with the spirit of a dead monkey, a pet of the previous inhabitants.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Chillingham Castle
programme.desc: In the 1100s, many battles between England and Scotland were fought near Chillingham Castle. Since the 1200s, the same family has been living there in harmony with the ghosts.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Avebury Stones and the Red Lion Inn
programme.desc: Avebury Stones and the Red Lion Inn are supposedly the most paranormal places in Great Britain. Three ghosts are said to haunt have been haunting the Red Lion Inn since the 1600s.
programme.sub-title: Avebury Stones and the Red Lion Inn

programme.title: Most Haunted: Drury Lane Theatre
programme.desc: The Theatre Royal, Drury Lane is considered the most haunted theatre in the world. Will the team encounter the theatre's most famous ghost, the "Man in Grey?"

programme.title: Most Haunted: Leap Castle
programme.desc: The team make their way to Leap Castle in Ireland, which is said to be home to a half-human, half-animal ghost.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Ostrich Inn
programme.desc: The village of Colnbrook is home to one of the oldest pubs in Great Britain, the Ostrich Inn. Legend has it that in the 1400s over 60 people met their death there, boiled in oil by the evil landlord.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Souter Lighthouse
programme.desc: Yvette and the team travel to the historic Souter Lighthouse. Derek detects the sudden smell of tobacco at the top of the building and equipment begins switching itself on and off.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Charnock Hall
programme.desc: In the 1600s, Catholicism was frowned upon in Britain and many masses were conducted in Charnock Hall in secrecy. Current owners and past residents have witnessed priestly apparitions manifest.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Culzean Castle
programme.desc: Culzean Castle in Ayrshire, Scotland is supposed to be haunted by seven ghosts. Derek arrives and takes the crew straight to the most haunted room in the house, the Earl of Cassillis's bedroom.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Another Song For Christmas
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark try to help a heartless used car salesman reconsider his actions on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Plane Death
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark investigate a gang of drug smugglers after an old friend of Mark's has mysteriously disappeared.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: One Winged Angels
programme.desc: Jonathan attempts to fan the flames of love between a woman and her ex-husband's best friend. But his efforts backfire when he falls for the woman himself.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Going Home, Going Home
programme.desc: Mark is in a state between life and death when he's critically injured in a car accident. Jonathan takes Mark back to childhood to give him a second chance to tell his grandfather how much he loves him.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: As Difficult as ABC
programme.desc: Jonathan steps in when a heart condition sidelines a promising basketball player's dreams.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Child of God
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark are on hand when a dying woman attempts a reconciliation with her estranged father. She is a single mother who wants her family to take the child.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Match Made in Heaven
programme.desc: Scotty is a lovelorn quadriplegic with a successful law practice. Jonathan is happy to play cupid, but Mark isn't so thrilled about it, because the woman in question is his cousin.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Banker and The Bum
programme.desc: A greedy banker and a good-hearted bum switch places. The bum dies, but the banker is now infused with love and generosity.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger UK: Nerys McGarry
programme.desc: Can the team pull off their biggest challenge to date and make Nerys McGarry - who has lost eight stone - 21 years younger?

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: American Beauty
programme.desc: When Yanilsa immigrated to the United States with her three sisters, the culture shock of learning a new language, helping look after her sisters and going back to school hasn't left her any time to take care of herself.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger New Zealand: Josh Thomson
programme.desc: Josh Thomson is a struggling actor, struggling with terminal scruffiness, and premature aging. Fiona McDonald and her team of anti-aging experts prepare to take on Josh, making him 10 Years Younger in just 10 days.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger UK: Kerry Fender
programme.desc: From a distance Kerry Fender seems frumpy, defeated and definitely middle-aged. Presenter Nicky Hambleton-Jones assembles a crack team of dentist, hairdresser and cosmetic GP but to get Kerry looking 10 years younger.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger New Zealand: Debbie Vercoe
programme.desc: Fitness fanatic Debbie Vercoe has a great body but unfortunately her face is letting her down. Fiona McDonald assembles a crack team of experts to whip Debbie into shape. But are they up to the challenge?

programme.title: 10 Years Younger UK: Janice Holmes "One Year On"
programme.desc: A year ago wife and mother, Janice Holmes was 42 but the poll of one hundred people in her hometown of Blackpool put their average guess at six years older than she really is. Nicky Hambleton-Jones revisits one year on.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Getting the Ball in Her Court
programme.desc: Kristin is an aspiring television sportscaster, but her appearance is getting in the way of landing her dream job. But our team is on the ball and is hoping to get Kristin ready for air!
programme.sub-title: Getting the Ball in Her Court

programme.title: 10 Years Younger UK: Gill Collyer
programme.desc: A hectic household of 3 lively kids, 1 husband, 4 cats and a dog, equals chaos and stress for Gill Collyer from Devon and it's showing all over her face. Luckily Nicky Hambleton-Jones and her team are here to the rescue.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: From Father To Son
programme.desc: Tobe took a hiatus from his career to care for his dying father, and now he's trying to pick up where he left off. Tobe needs to refurbish his appearance so he can look like the man his younger wife married.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Dawn Of A New Day
programme.desc: Dawn Peluso is a stay at home mother of three. Taking care of her children is a full time job – one that doesn't allow personal pamper breaks. Dawn is afraid her looks are going out with the dirty diapers, and she is concerned for her marriage.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger UK: Wendy Grace
programme.desc: Ex glamour model and air hostess Wendy Grace lost her good looks when she gave up that life for a market stall in Christchurch. Hair, make up and a new wardrobe will all help in the fight to make Wendy look younger but her face needs urgent repair work.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: A Knockout Makeover
programme.desc: As a former title holding boxer and stuntwoman, Bridgett spent years getting pummeled and abused and her looks are now suffering. We're going to unleash Bridgett's feminine flair and make her look 10 years younger!

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: A Diamond in the Rough
programme.desc: Dashia is a spinning instructor by day and a feisty tenants rights advocate in her spare time. Our Glam Squad and team of doctors are going to take this diamond in the rough and smooth out some of the sharp edges.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Hope for the Best
programme.desc: Hope is a dedicated single parent who has been told she dresses too old for her age. Along with the daily stresses of work and motherhood, the recent loss of Hope's mother's has also taken its toll on her appearance.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 3
programme.desc: Danny has been preparing his pitch for an Endangered Species Project. JLW, a pharmaceutical company, are looking to fund an environmental project and the family hope that this grant money will enable them to buy Leopard's Den and Mara.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 4
programme.desc: Danny and Ed release two cheetah brothers together, a symbol of their new partnership, but not all of the family are happy about this new start. Caroline is still furious at what she sees as Danny's betrayal of Du Plessis.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 5
programme.desc: The family are still estranged following Caroline's decision to move back to the decrepit Clearwater house with Du Plessis. Rosie is determined to reunite everyone, and plans a civilised dinner as a step towards reconciliation.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 6
programme.desc: Danny is in prison, accused of murdering Peeters, but Du Plessis is determined to prove his friend's innocence by any means he can. Du Plessis' first attempt backfires disastrously when he harangues a police officer and ends up in a cell next to Danny.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 7
programme.desc: With Danny away, and Du Plessis undertaking an ignominious stretch of community service, Ed is left in charge of running the Endangered Species Project.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 8
programme.desc: Danny and Ed are anxiously preparing for a review with JLW, the pharmaceutical company that fund their Endangered Species Project. They are desperate for it to go smoothly, and as a result are driving the rest of the family mad.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 9
programme.desc: Following the loss of their funding, the family are in dire financial straits. Danny and Ed attempt to get an extension on their mortgage but are refused. Fiona spurs Ed on, telling him that the man she used to know would have a plan for survival.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 10
programme.desc: Strange things are happening at Leopard's Den. The family awake to find frogs everywhere, seemingly having rained down overnight; the giraffe refuses to budge from the front gate and the cheetah is off its food.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 1
programme.desc: The Rescue 1 chopper team struggles to save two young men who are feared drowned at Hahei; a Coromandel motorcyclist is struggling with punctured lungs, and young man is trapped inside a car after a high speed accident.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 2
programme.desc: A teenage motorcyclist is fighting for his life after crashing on a remote farm near Warkworth, a man has 2nd degree burns to his face and hands from an accidental explosion, and four men are missing after two boats capsized on the Kawhia bar.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 3
programme.desc: The Rescue 1 team battles to save a man trapped in his overturned Land Rover on Rakino Island; a star rugby player at Onewhero may have broken his neck after a scrum collapsed, and a man out cycling on Waiheke is clinging to life after a cardiac arrest.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 4
programme.desc: The chopper team has an intense struggle to keep a young Waikato woman alive after her car collided with a heavy truck, an 18 year old man is in terrible pain with a dislocated shoulder, and a 9 year old boy is in a bad way after falling out of a tree.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 5
programme.desc: The Westpac chopper crew attempt to save a Waiheke man who has life-threatening injuries after falling off a ladder and a motocross rider is in a bad way after a 100-foot jump goes badly wrong.

programme.title: Air Rescue: Episode 4
programme.desc: Mountain bike fanatic, Blake was out riding when he clipped a tree and crashed into a rock. It's a time critical rescue mission. And what the rescue crew doesn't yet know is that Blake is about to take a turn for the worse.

programme.title: Air Rescue: Episode 5
programme.desc: Motorbike rider, Lachlan was testing out his newly designed dirt-bike track when he lost control on a jump. His femur has been badly shattered. The Air Rescue crew is tasked with flying Lachlan to hospital but his medical dramas have only just begun.

programme.title: Air Rescue: Episode 6
programme.desc: Retirees Diane and husband Gary were just a few hours into their Pacific Island cruise of a lifetime when disaster struck. Diane toppled down a set of stairs and now she's in need of urgent medical attention.

programme.title: Air Rescue: Episode 1
programme.desc: A leisure helicopter has gone down in Sydney's Royal National Park with a family of four on board, including three year-old Finn. The stakes are always high when children are involved. The rescue crew locates the crash site but can't get too close.

programme.title: Air Rescue: Episode 2
programme.desc: Three surfing mates go missing in dangerous surf. The massive swell threatens to smash them onto the rocks in Sydney's Lurline Bay. The rescue crew is on a search and rescue mission but there's no sign of the surfer boys.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 6
programme.desc: The helicopter rescue crew responds to Pauanui to save a truck driver who's smashed through the windscreen after rolling his truck and a Port Charles family is distraught after a young girl is run over by a quad bike.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 7
programme.desc: The chopper crewmen have their hands full with five badly injured patients after a car crash near Waiuku, and a massive motorcycle pile-up leaves injured bikers all over the road, and a man may have broken his neck after falling from his horse.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 8
programme.desc: As a weather bomb hits, the chopper crew set out on one of the most challenging missions they have ever undertaken 20 miles off shore, a man lays face down at Muriwai beach unable to move.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 9
programme.desc: A hang glider pilot may have broken his back after a heavy crash-landing, a Manaia man is in a bad way after coming off a sea biscuit at high speed, and a crashed Waikato driver needs an urgent air-lift to hospital to save his life.

programme.title: Supercars: Porsche to the Max!
programme.desc: 2011 has been a record year for Porsche. The German car manufacturer was able to sell more cars than ever before. But it is not just Porsche that is popular with sports car fans, Porsche refiners enjoy success, too.

programme.title: Supercars: Luxury SUVs
programme.desc: On this episode of Supercars, it’s all about luxury SUVs and off-road vehicles for the big spenders out there. What is the new Land Rover capable? Which luxury cars can we expect to see at the Grand Cherokee Summit?

programme.title: Supercars: Pagani Story
programme.desc: For petrolheads the name Pagani is a synonym of the roaring sound of thunder. This is due to the 12-cylinder high-performance engine used by the Italian sports car manufacturer to make the ground shake.

programme.title: Supercars: Hot Supercars
programme.desc: Making something perfect even better isn’t possible – or is it? Aston Martin V8 Vantage, Porsche 918 Spyder, Bentley Mulsanne, Audi R8 V10 and Bugatti Veyron Grand Sport Super Vitesse make the impossible possible.

programme.title: Supercars: German Supercars
programme.desc: They are long and heavy, and they are German: the A8 Audi does not do much downsizing as well as the large executive cars from BMW or the luxurious VW Phaeton. The big players of the premium car manufacturers!

programme.title: Supercars: Motor Show Geneva
programme.desc: There are details which set supercars apart from normal cars and these details are essential. Supercars are the biggest, loudest and most expensive cars on the highway; they're four-wheeled works of art.

programme.title: Supercars: V8 Power
programme.desc: The 'facelift' of the new Mercedes E cost around one billion euros! But it is only one part of the exclusivity of the new E 63 AMG. Of course, the high performance brand of Mercedes-Benz added several other features!

programme.title: Supercars: British Power
programme.desc: Very British: power and performance, craftsmanship and design. We have a look at the most beautiful cars of Aston Martin, Bentley and Rolls-Royce.

programme.title: Top Ten Show: The Fastest Cars in the World
programme.desc: In this episode, we decide what's hot and what's not in the glamorous world of cars. This time we've decided to focus on the fastest cars.
programme.sub-title: The Fastest Cars in the World

programme.title: Top Ten Show: The Most Expensive Production Cars
programme.desc: Real luxury. The kind of cars that you only dream of. On today's Top Ten Show, we're going to expose the most expensive cars in production.

programme.title: Top Ten Show: The Ten Slowest Cars
programme.desc: Usually, when you talk about cars, it's all about their speed and velocity. But this time we’ve decided to turn the tables and are going to show you the opposite end of the spectrum: the ten most sluggish cars.

programme.title: Top Ten Show: The Ten Most Fuel-efficient Cars
programme.desc: Fuel prices keep going up. Oil companies are justifying this with high demands and rising oil prices. And the prices will carry-on going up. So on today's show we are showing you ten of the most fuel-efficient cars.

programme.title: Top Ten Show: The Most Unusual Cars of Modern Times
programme.desc: Day in day out, R&D departments of car manufacturers ponder over about what constitutes the perfect car. It has to be extraordinary. It has to stand out and it has to be unique.
programme.sub-title: The Most Unusual Cars of Modern Times

programme.title: Top Ten Show: The Most Successful Cars in the 24h Race
programme.desc: The 24-hour-race at the German Nürburgring is one of the most famous and dangerous long-distance races in the world and in today's program we'll show you the cars that have won the most titles each year.
programme.sub-title: The Most Successful Cars in the 24h Race

programme.title: Top Ten Show: The Most Affordable Hybrid Models
programme.desc: In today's show, we are going to show you the most affordable hybrid models. The trail-blazers are definitely the Japanese, who have a whole bunch of cars to offer.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Dark Horizons
programme.desc: Eight Taelons are killed when protectors' implants are re-calibrated with a new imperative to kill instead of protect Taelons. They fear the Jiridians have found a way to control the CVIs. Meanwhile, their core energy continues to deplete.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Point of No Return
programme.desc: When Street solves the 8th dimension of Ma'el's riddle, a beacon leads Liam to a chamber with a healing pool. However, there is only enough in the healing pool to help 6 Taelons. Zo'or will do anything to insure his own life.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Decision
programme.desc: Police captain William Boone is asked to join the security team of Companion Da'an of the Taelon, an alien race that came to earth three years ago.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Truth
programme.desc: Boone tries to find out who murdered his wife.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Miracle
programme.desc: Boone helps prevents a suicide of a handless girl. Da'an wants to use revolutionary Taelon technology to help the girl for propaganda reasons.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Avatar
programme.desc: Boone and Marquette must find James Pike, a mysterious escaped serial killer who rose from the dead.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Old Flame
programme.desc: While plutonium is stolen from a nuclear plant, Boone is is having a tough time concentrating. His mind is on Elyse Chapel, a famous musician and old flame.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Live Free or Die
programme.desc: Navy Seal major Raymond McIntyre kidnaps Da'an and demands to know where his men are. They were involved in a inter-dimensional space flight test that went wrong.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Manifesto
programme.desc: A cabin on the slopes of Pikes Peak catches fire, and a young sheriff’s deputy is posted to guard the scene overnight--then he’s found dead in his patrol car the next morning.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Knock Knock
programme.desc: A gathering of friends turns deadly when two gunmen shoot William Davis in the head. Kenda and his team dig into his past and start to suspect someone in William’s circle is lying.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Written in Blood
programme.desc: A community is shocked when Antoine McKenzie is brazenly shot outside an auto parts store in broad daylight. The only lead left for Lt. Joe Kenda is a final message written in the victim’s own blood.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: I Will Hunt You Down
programme.desc: When two escaped inmates surface in Colorado Springs, it’s up to Lt. Joe Kenda and his Fugitive Unit to bring them to justice.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Murder in a Bottle
programme.desc: Eric Houston is found stabbed to death in a seedy motel, but the ensuing investigation is stymied by a long list of suspects. Lt. Joe Kenda deploys a groundbreaking new technology to catch the killer.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: John 3:16
programme.desc: A man rushes his friend to the hospital with serious gunshot wounds, reporting they were robbed by strangers. When the facts don’t add up, Lt. Joe Kenda and his team go on the hunt.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Body in the Freezer
programme.desc: A meeting between two businessmen leaves one shot in the face. Things seem cut and dry until Lt. Kenda realizes the “victim” could actually be the aggressor, shot struggling over his own gun.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Death Rains Down
programme.desc: Restaurant worker Sharon Coleman is murdered in a hail of large caliber gunfire. Kenda must break through a web of lies to hunt down one of the most dangerous criminal masterminds he’s ever faced.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: A Lack of Vision, Wound Up Rottie, Attack of the Peek-a-Poo
programme.desc: Cody, a blind Yorkshire terrier, is overly protective. Rottweiler Buffy has a dangerous obsession with the horses. Peek-a-Poo puppy Chloe, growls, snaps, and bites to get her way.
programme.sub-title: A Lack of Vision, Wound Up Rottie, Attack of the Peek-a-Poo

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Jake in Exile
programme.desc: An Australian Shepherd/Pit Bull Mix has severe aggression problems towards women. A Boxer is an expert escape artist, able to jump the 6 foot backyard fence. Her owners are concerned for her safety.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Anti-Social Sasha
programme.desc: Sasha, a pound pup, is perfect in the house, but outside she shows aggression towards other dogs. Angler, a Lab, is blind, and exhibits strange behavior around food.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Duke & Lulu, and Sparky
programme.desc: Cesar heads to the dog park to help some frustrated dog lovers. A therapeutic terrier helps AJ control her panic attacks but tends to attack other dogs.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Joe, and Penny, Roxy, Rico, Lou, & Solomon, and Promise
programme.desc: An Australian shepherd is so devoted to his owner that he breaks leashes to be with her; a neurotic beagle makes trouble for a pack of foster dogs; and an Italian mastiff puppy fears riding in cars.
programme.sub-title: Joe, and Penny, Roxy, Rico, Lou, & Solomon, and Promise

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: High Anxiety
programme.desc: A Pointer mix is fixated on pinecones, while an Australian shepherd whines every time his owner switches on the vacuum cleaner. Can Cesar help?

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Hyde & Vada and Nacho
programme.desc: Hyde and Vada, both wolf hybrids have aggression issues to work out especially when it comes to other dogs. Nacho, bit a child, and shows aggression when he has his toy.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Wears Diapers/Eats Dryer Sheets
programme.desc: For Riley, there's nothing like the comfort of wearing a warm, wet diaper. She lives as an adult baby to escape the stresses of life. And Charmissa chews on dryer sheets for up to 10 hours a day.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Rampant Rats/Extreme Fingernails
programme.desc: Theresa has more than 60 pet hairless rats that are taking over her apartment. Jazz has been growing her fingernails for 22 years. Her longest nail is two feet long, and she calls them her children.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: My Strange Addiction Special 2
programme.desc: In this one-hour special, we revisit six of our addicts whose stories shocked the world. Tune in for exclusive never before seen footage in this special episode.

programme.title: My Crazy Obsession: Airline Addict_Crazy for Capybaras
programme.desc: Anthony has been collecting aviation memorabilia since he was 5. Melanie is crazy about her pet capybara, Gari, taking him for walks and teaching him tricks.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Casting / Psychics
programme.desc: Profiled are Kevin, who constantly covers his body in plaster casts even though he is not injured, and Melissa who is incapable of making a decision without a consulting a psychic.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Gas Sniffer/Teddy Bear Obsession
programme.desc: For more than 30 years, Theresa has been addicted to smelling gasoline. Meanwhile, former drug-addict Krista has 12 'children' -- all of which are teddy bears.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Addicted to Inflatables/Butt Injection Addict
programme.desc: Mark has been addicted to his 15 inflatable pool toys, eating with them, sleeping with them and even bathing them. Karmello has been getting black market butt injections for the last three years.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Eats Dirt/Extreme Toenails
programme.desc: Kristie has eaten dirt every day for the last 30 years, consuming more than five tons since her addiction began. Meanwhile, Ayanna is addicted to growing her toenails.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Eats Cleanser/Tanner
programme.desc: Ever since she was twelve Crystle has been obsessed with eating household cleanser. Samantha is addicted to tanning and visits multiple tanning salons in order to get her fix.

programme.title: My Crazy Obsession: My Crazy Obsession Christmas Spcl 1
programme.desc: My Crazy Obsession: Christmas Collection takes you inside the lives of extreme collectors who have taken holiday decorating to the max. For these obsessed collectors, it's Christmas year round.

programme.title: My Crazy Obsession: Love Bunnies_ World's Strongest Family
programme.desc: The Best family is so obsessed with their own strength that they spend countless hours lifting weights. Candace and Steve's collection of bunny items has reached nearly 30,000 pieces.

programme.title: My Crazy Obsession: Raggedy Ann_A Rat's Tale
programme.desc: Chantal’s 19 pet rats are more than just pets; she considers them her children. Robyn loves to share her obsession with Raggedy Ann and she tries to convert new Raggedy believers.

programme.title: Buying Alaska: Isolated Village
programme.desc: Sean and Jolene want a home in the Alaskan village of Gustavus, where the wildlife runs rampant. There are no roads in or out of town and it’s so remote the bears feel free to walk into your house!

programme.title: Buying Alaska: Mrs. Alaska & Military Man
programme.desc: Pat Harrigan is a soldier, newly stationed at the army base in Fairbanks, Alaska. His wife Rocky just won the crown as the current Mrs. Alaska, but she’s a city girl at heart.

programme.title: Buying Alaska: Fish Out Of Water
programme.desc: Grant and Khrissy just got engaged. He’s all-Alaskan but she’s a fish out of water from the Deep South. The couple wants to buy a house that’s a mix of the Alaskan bush and her Alabama roots.

programme.title: Buying Alaska: Outhouse Life
programme.desc: Sean and Charlotte want a home in Fairbanks, Alaska, that won’t cost them a penny in utility bills. So they’re going off-the-grid. And that means one thing… there’ll be no bathrooms.

programme.title: Buying Alaska: Hangar Homes
programme.desc: Born and bred Alaskans Andy and Nicole grew up in a town so remote, their family vehicles were airplanes! Now that they’re looking for a new home, they need an airplane hangar and a runway.

programme.title: Buying Alaska: Remote Coves
programme.desc: Charlie and Toni are outdoor adventure junkies who want a home in Alaska that’s so remote they can catch their next meal from the ocean right off their front porch.

programme.title: Buying Alaska: Homer Bound
programme.desc: Nathan and Lindsay are brand new to Alaska. They want a house similar to where Nathan’s pioneer grandfather lived, in the bayside town of Homer, surrounded by the great outdoors.

programme.title: Buying Alaska: Life On A Mountain
programme.desc: Russ and Dana search for a home in the town of Girdwood, Alaska, at the base of towering Mount Alyeska. The views are spectacular, but the danger of an avalanches is real.

programme.title: Buying Alaska: Guys Getaway
programme.desc: David Parks and Chris Erickson are best friends, and professional handymen. They want to buy a weekend getaway house in the wilds of Alaska, but they don’t want to spend a lot of money.

programme.title: Buying Alaska: Juneau Waterfront
programme.desc: Chris and Heidi are marine adventurers who want Alaska’s marine wildlife right out their front door. They want to buy a home on the coveted waterfront of the oceanside city of Juneau.

programme.title: Buying Alaska: Tiny Homes, Big Mountain
programme.desc: Pete and Martha have lived and worked in some of the wildest locations in the U.S. In Alaska they want an isolated home with views of the tallest peak in North America - Mount McKinley.

programme.title: Buying Alaska: Dollars Or Drains
programme.desc: Texas native Colby wants an affordable home, but he’s in for a shock because, in Alaska, that means a dry cabin – with no running water. He doesn’t know anything about life without plumbing.

programme.title: Buying Alaska: Dangerous Trails
programme.desc: Brandon and Hanna want a home on an isolated lake far into the Alaskan wild, where there’s no way in but off-roading through trails of mud or landing on water.

programme.title: Buying Alaska: No Roads In
programme.desc: Dave and Wendy want a remote cabin where they can escape to the Alaskan frontier way of life, places so hidden that the only way there is by off-road vehicle and no outhouse is safe from hungry bears.

programme.title: Baywatch: Swept Away
programme.desc: Mitch befriends a boy who joins junior lifeguards in hopes of escaping a brutal home life. Jessie makes a passionate play for JD. Alex auditions for “Jeopardy!”

programme.title: Baywatch: The Swimmer
programme.desc: Upset about his failed marriage to Neely, Mitch goes for a day-long tower swim along the beach and encounters problems that distract from his own, including April and Craig's May/December romance, and reluctant heroes Cody and JD.

programme.title: Baywatch: Friends Forever
programme.desc: A young, hearing-impaired girl learns a lesson in friendship when she, Mitch and Alex protect an orangutan, while Cody and Jessie deal with its abusive owner.

programme.title: Baywatch: The Edge
programme.desc: Cody puts his career, and his life, on the line when he uses a performance-enhancing supplement in hopes of making the Olympic swim team. Alex becomes the object of Mitch's rejection, and Newmie's affection.

programme.title: Baywatch: The Big Blue
programme.desc: Mitch tries to reunite an Army parachutist with her estranged Naval-officer father, while Cody helps a beautiful woman try to reach record-setting depths at a national free-diving competition.

programme.title: Baywatch: Come Fly with Me
programme.desc: After he tries to save Tanner from his abusive father, Mitch ends up on the wrong side of the law. Meanwhile, Jessie's irresistible charm makes a stunt pilot's heart take flight.

programme.title: Baywatch: Boys will be Boys
programme.desc: When caught up in a high-risk adventure at sea, Craig tells Mitch a shocking secret. Meanwhile, Jessie works to creatively end JD and Cody's rivalry during a beachside triathlon, and April comes clean with Manny.

programme.title: Baywatch: Baywatch Grand Prix
programme.desc: Mitch feels the need for speed when Tanner's cousin, Damon Lusk, a race car driver in town for a major competition, visits Baywatch. Meanwhile, Newmie and the gang develop a TV show about lifeguards that they try to sell it into syndication.

programme.title: Baywatch: Baywatch Down Under, Part 1
programme.desc: After Mitch's lifeguard buddy's ex-wife dies in Australia, Mitch and the team accompany him on a trip down under to meet the son he's never known.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8110
programme.desc: Fully bonded with Kelly and Phoebe, Liam accepts Steffy’s offer of moving back in to the Cliff House. Flo begs Zoe to allow the truth to be revealed but Zoe is concerned about going to jail.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8111
programme.desc: Thomas has inner conflict about if he should, and who he should, tell that Hope’s baby is alive. Wyatt demands answers when he overhears Flo, Xander and Zoe speaking about Beth.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8112
programme.desc: Ridge worries that his marriage to Brooke will suffer because of their children’s circumstances Xander, Zoe and Flo are stunned by Thomas sudden change of heart and his threats against them.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8113
programme.desc: Hope becomes distraught after losing something close to her heart. Brooke is convinced that Thomas is using Douglas as a pawn in his plan to win Hope.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8114
programme.desc: Hope is taken aback when Thomas surprises her with a Forrester Original and a kiss. Separately, Flo and Steffy push back when Wyatt and Liam organize a get-together.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8115
programme.desc: Xander blows up on Thomas after realizing he’s continuing to manipulate Hope. Flo and Steffy agree, for different reasons, that baby Phoebe is definitely a Logan.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8116
programme.desc: Thomas refuses to back down when Brooke confronts him about controlling her daughter. The web of their deceit begins to unravel as Thomas, Zoe and Xander argue amongst themselves.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8117
programme.desc: Zoe and Xander struggle with being on opposite sides of doing the right thing. As Thomas’ obsession with Hope spirals out of control, Hope recalls her life with Liam.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8118
programme.desc: Brooke confides in Bill her trepidation about Thomas and the two reflect upon his shady past. The secret of baby Beth spirals out of control before taking a deadly turn.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8119
programme.desc: Ridge and Brooke’s relationship is put to the test when they learn the distressing news of an untimely death. Pam gives a suspicious Brooke a clue about what may have happened leading up to the tragedy.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8120
programme.desc: The Forresters, Logans, Spencers, Spectras and Avants gather together to mourn one of their own. Quinn, Eric, Steffy and Hope share poignant memories and comfort one another during a difficult time.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8121
programme.desc: Thomas calls upon his friend Vincent to assist in his plan to make Hope his own. With Hope in the middle, Brooke and Ridge take opposing viewpoints on her immediate future.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8122
programme.desc: Thomas panics when Hope breaks down and begins to call Phoebe Beth. Given the events that have recently transpired, Wyatt makes a big life decision.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8123
programme.desc: Wyatt and Flo celebrate their relationship and their decision to take it to the next level. Thomas drugs Liam and then uses his erratic behavior to his advantage with Hope.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8124
programme.desc: Upon awakening, Liam remembers how he pushed Hope away and pulled Steffy closer. Satisfied by his manipulation of Liam, Thomas shares his next plan with Douglas.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8125
programme.desc: Liam confesses to a heartbroken Hope about his night with Steffy. Steffy calls Thomas out for wanting to end Liam and Hope’s relationship.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8126
programme.desc: Thomas convinces Douglas to propose to Hope as if it were his own idea. Steffy does her best to comfort Liam as he recalls his last Fourth of July with Hope.

programme.desc: A man drifting through time desperately searches for some meaning to his life.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Marooned on Mongo
programme.desc: Earth teenagers Flash Gordon and Dale Arden, and their reluctant friend Dr. Zarkov, journey to the fantastic planet Mongo where they fight to defeat the evil planetary dictator, Ming the Merciless.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Jaws of the Jungle
programme.desc: Flash, Dale and Dr. Zarkov rescue the Lionid Princess Thundar from Ming and the treacherous Vine People. This feat earns them the respect of Prince Talon and renews the rebellion against Ming.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: The Caves of Doom
programme.desc: Flash races time to save Dale and Dr. Zarkov from being sacrificed to a volcano by the Trogs, a tribe of suspicious cave dwellers.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Vandals from the Void
programme.desc: When Mongo is attacked by a fleet of UFOs, only Flash questions Ming's attempts to form an alliance with the Rebel forces.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Fangs of Fury
programme.desc: Thundar's mother falls fatally ill, and only Ming holds the antidote. His price for the cure: Flash Gordon! How will Thundar decide?

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Terror Beneath the Waves
programme.desc: Queen Kayla and her Shark People hold Flash captive underwater while Ming prepares a sneak attack on the Rebel forces.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Wings of Destruction
programme.desc: Flash competes against Aura in the Mongonian Aerial Games. Although a truce is in effect during the games, Ming attacks.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: The Invisible Claw
programme.desc: Sulpha, Ming's dragon scientist, creates an army of invisible Rock People to conquer a peaceful desert kingdom. Can Flash stop them?

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Pit of the Tigrons
programme.desc: While Ming is away, Aura takes command of Mongo. She offers a truce if Flash will agree to marry her and rule Mongo at her side.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Cry of the Pantheron
programme.desc: Kobalt the mercenary pretends to fall in love with Thundar, raising Flash's suspicions when he joins an attack on Ming's bomb factory.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: The Dragon Strikes
programme.desc: Flash, Dale and Dr. Zarkov discover Mango's legendary lost Hall of Science. Surprisingly, Sulpha helps keep the secret from Ming.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: The Wrath of Ming
programme.desc: Believing that Ming has lost his mind, Aura and Kayla hatch separate plots to overthrow Ming and take the throne of Mongo.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Rocket to Oblivion
programme.desc: Flash, Dale and Dr. Zarkov set off for Earth in an experimental space ship, unaware that Sulpha has hidden a bomb in the ship.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Ambush in Arboria
programme.desc: Dale joins forces with one of Ming's loyal supporters, handsome Prince Barin of Arboria. Is Dale betraying Flash and the rebellion?

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Moon of Mystery
programme.desc: Flash and Aura form an uneasy alliance to protect the peaceful inhabitants of a previously undiscovered moon from Ming's wrath.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Revenge of the Dragon!
programme.desc: Sulpha finds a cache of what seem to be dragon eggs, and asks Flash to stall Ming while she searches for the secret to her lost race.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: Junk food addict Andy moves into the feeding clinic with `too-busy-to-eat' Hannah, who battles with Andy's junk food medley as she forces down pizzas, burgers and kebabs.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: Last year superskinny Gillian and supersize Phillipa entered the feeding clinic to help each other unlock their dysfunctional relationship with food. How are getting on?

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: This week it’s non stop tears and tantrums as 21 stone 5lbs LouiseHayes is forced to swap her normal 5-6 course feasts for superskinny Josh Evans‘s diet which barely features a proper meal.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: In the feeding clinic Louise Knox, queen of convenience food, meets Carly Pitman, who's so busy she never finds the time to eat.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: Supersized Alyson Mawunga swaps her colossal portions and sugary snacks with superskinny Nick Wood, who lives off caffeine drinks and little else.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: At just 6 stone 10lbs, 19 year old Tatiana Moxfis extremely underweight and desperate for people to stop asking her if she's got an eating disorder

programme.title: Addicted to Food: Sharon's Story
programme.desc: This is the tragic story of Sharon Mevsimler, a 45 stone woman who had a life saving operation – and then starved herself to death at the age of 41.

programme.title: Sex Party 101
programme.desc: What exactly happens at a sex club? Ever attended? Been invited but got cold feet? Sex Party 101 dives in with a handful of sexperts to get the down and dirty as well as the etiquette of varying sex parties.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 14
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a mid terrace in Devon, a house of two halves in Swindon and a lot of flat for very little cash in Selby, Yorkshire.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 7
programme.desc: Lucy Alexander and Martin Roberts see a reasonable size flat above a shop in Somerset; a narrow three bed roomed house in south London and in Kent, a house has a lot of potential and could be turned into a lovely home; but has somebody already started?

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy view properties in Berkshire, Scunthorpe and West Sussex.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin Roberts and Lucy Alexander view a cottage in Kent and three-bedroom terrace in Derby.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit properties in Derbyshire, Trowbridge and North London.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit properties in Canterbury, County Durham and Devon.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy view a four-bedroom house in Tyne and Wear, a detached bungalow in Rochester and a house in Plymouth.

programme.title: Munchies
programme.desc: Simon Watterman, a space archaeologist, discovers the "Munchies" in a cave in Peru. Cecil Watterman, Simon's evil twin brother and snack food entrepreneur, kidnaps the creature.

programme.title: Dorian Gray
programme.desc: A corrupt young man somehow keeps his youthful beauty eternally, but a special painting gradually reveals his inner ugliness to all. Feat: Helmut Berger, Richard Todd & Herbert Lom.

programme.title: New Rose Hotel
programme.desc: Two businessmen are hired to steal secrets from a rival, and decide to use a beautiful, but volatile call girl to do so. Starring: Christopher Walken, Willem Dafoe, Asia Argento

programme.title: Bad Lieutenant
programme.desc: While investigating a young nun's rape, a corrupt New York City police detective, with a serious drug and gambling addiction, tries to change his ways and find forgiveness and redemption. Starring: Harvey Keitel, Brian McElroy, Frank Acciarito

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30: Curry in a Hurry Night
programme.desc: Indian meals are the epitome of a full family dinner. Host Spencer Watts uses bold flavours to make classic Butter Chicken and refreshing Mango Lassi.

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30: Taco Night
programme.desc: Have a fun, inexpensive, 30-minute fiesta in the kitchen with chef Spencer Watts’ favourite taco night recipes.

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30: Meatless Monday Night
programme.desc: Meatless Monday can be done any day of the week. Chef Spencer Watts makes a cheap, filling, family-style vegetarian meal in around 30 minutes

programme.title: One World Kitchen: Flavours of the Sea
programme.desc: Host Natalia Machado knows that cooking fish and seafood in Argentina means simple ingredients to let the natural flavours shine!

programme.title: One World Kitchen: It's all About the Olive Oil
programme.desc: The greatest staple of Italian cuisine? Olive oil! Host Vanessa Gianfrancesco uses olive oil to make delightful Italian dishes.
programme.sub-title: It's all About the Olive Oil

programme.title: One World Kitchen: Entertaining, Japanese Style
programme.desc: Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen shares her Japanese entertaining secrets featuring dishes like Japanese Chicken Wings and Chawanmushi.

programme.title: One World Kitchen: Versatile Indian Flavours
programme.desc: Host Vijaya Selvaraju makes delectable Indian dishes using versatile Indian spices and flavours.

programme.title: One World Kitchen: Layers of Thai Flavour
programme.desc: Thai host Palin Congchitnant uses fresh Thai ingredients and flavours to make Smoked Trout Salad and a Kaffir Lime Vodka Martini.

programme.title: One World Kitchen: Argentinian Barbeque Favourites
programme.desc: Barbeque is a go-to cooking method in many cultures. Host Natalia Machado grills up delicious Argentinian barbeque favourites like Empanadas.

programme.title: One World Kitchen: Spiced up Sauces
programme.desc: Sauce is king in Italian cuisine! Warm host Vanessa Gianfrancesco shows us how to cook three simple Italian sauces.

programme.title: One World Kitchen: Versatile Miso
programme.desc: Miso is an extremely common ingredient in Japanese cuisine. Host Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen shows us how miso can add flavour and richness to any dish.

programme.title: One World Kitchen: Demystifying Indian Food
programme.desc: Charming host Vijaya Selvaraju demystifies a number of Indian dishes like Dal Soup in a crockpot and Fish in (three-ingredient) Red Chili Chutney.

programme.title: One World Kitchen: Thai Sauces
programme.desc: It's all about the sauces as Pailin Chongchitnant shows us how easy and versatile they are in Thai cuisine.

programme.title: One World Kitchen: Three Course Argentinian Meal
programme.desc: Warm host Natalia Machado makes a three course Argentinian meal that reminds her of her family.

programme.title: One World Kitchen: Stuffed Olives and Risotto
programme.desc: Italian host Vanessa Gianfrancesco whips up classy dishes for a gorgeous dinner party in Italy.

programme.title: One World Kitchen: Izakaya Finger Foods
programme.desc: Every culture has its version of finger food and in Japan it’s called Izakaya! Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen prepares tapas dishes perfect for nighttime snacking.

programme.title: Hunter
programme.desc: Hunter and McCall investigate the murders of teenage prostitutes and the prime suspect is a sadistic killer who impersonates a cop.

programme.title: Hunter: Last Run

programme.title: Hunter: The Return of Whitecloud

programme.desc: Hunter and McCall pursue the killer of college student who was the brother of Hunter's old friend.

programme.title: Deadly Women: Secrets and Lies

programme.title: Deadly Women: Killer Kids

programme.title: The FBI Files: Moving Target
programme.desc: When a sniper in Utah started targeting African-American men for death, authorities launched a massive investigation. With scant clues and no witnesses they found the odds stacked against them, and they had no idea where the killer would strike next.

programme.title: The FBI Files: The Predator
programme.desc: In the early 1990's, Washington, D.C., became the murder capital of the nation. Few were left untouched by gang violence, which was ignited by the drug trade. By 1994, that violence would strike at the very heart of law enforcement.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: Bank robbery is a brazen yet simple crime. A mask, a gun, a note passed to a teller. But bank burglary is different. It takes skill to disable an alarm, to penetrate a locked vault.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: In 1984, a tragic murder led agents into the frightening world of domestic terrorism. Law enforcement vowed to dismantle the violent faction that claimed responsibility.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Dishonored
programme.desc: Shirley Russell was determined enough to reach the rank of Captain in the United States Marine Corps. When this officer turned up missing, her colleagues refused to believe she had gone AWOL. It was unclear whether Captain Shirley Russell was alive.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Deadly Threat
programme.desc: A suspected drug dealer would stop at nothing to keep local and federal authorities from building a case against him. When his organization started targeting the government itself, federal agencies went on high alert.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Killer Abroad
programme.desc: Beginning in 1990, Europe found itself in the clutches of a serial killer. He became an international outlaw, hopping from country to country to evade capture and to kill again.

programme.title: Masters of Engineering

programme.title: Curious And Unusual Deaths: Episode 1: At Work

programme.desc: A hoarder booby-traps his brownstone, a French tailor tests an experimental glider off the Eiffel Tower, and famous scientist, Marie Curie is radiant about her discovery – all with fatal results.

programme.title: The F Word

programme.title: The F Word
