programme.title: The Apollo Experience: Apollo 17: Part 1
programme.desc: Between 1960 and 1972, mankind boldly went where no human had been before. Across 11 manned missions, 24 men flew to the moon and 12 walked upon its surface. This film documents Apollo 17 through the eyes of the astronauts who flew.

programme.title: The Apollo Experience: Apollo 17: Part 2
programme.desc: In this episode, hear first hand testimonials and dialogue from the incredible men who walked on the moon. Incredible footage and photos give a unique and beautiful experience of their data collection process and journey home.

programme.title: The Mystery of Dark Matter: The Mystery of Dark Matter
programme.desc: Dark matter, which is unknown and undetectable in our physical models, would appear to populate the cosmos on a massive scale. For the first time, a film portrays the wild scientific quest that dark matter gives rise to - a real thriller!

programme.title: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration
programme.desc: Cold War & The Start of the Space Race - Cold War rivalry and the acceleration of space exploration. Servicing Hubble - Preparations for Hubble's final servicing mission. Chasing a Comet - Launch and the difficult path to rendezvous.
programme.sub-title: The Space Race, The Hubble, Chasing Comets & Space Debris

programme.title: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration
programme.desc: Project Mercury Begins - The start of NASA & America's first manned space program. Mars Express - The European Space Agency's Mars Satellite. The Soyuz Launch System - The gradual evolution of Russia's Soyuz launcher.
programme.sub-title: Project Mercury, The Mars Express & The Soyuz Launch System

programme.title: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration
programme.desc: Project Mercury Advances - America's first manned space program finally puts a man in orbit. Camera Tracking - The array of special cameras that follow a spacecraft at launch. The International Space Station - The building and operation.
programme.sub-title: Project Mercury Advancement, Camera Tracking & The International Space Station

programme.title: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration
programme.desc: Project Gemini Commences - Did Gemini give the US a lead in the space race? Venus Express - The last days of ESA's Venus probe. EMU - NASA's Extravehicular Mobility Unit. Deep Space Communications - ESA's worldwide network of giant dishes.
programme.sub-title: Project Gemini, Venus Express, EMU & Deep Space Communication

programme.title: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration
programme.desc: Project Gemini Advances - NASA refines the techniques needed for rendezvous. Cassini at Saturn - In the Cassini probe's final years of activity, its handlers are asking it to do more complex and risky assignments.
programme.sub-title: Project Gemini Advances, Cassini at Saturn & More About Mars

programme.title: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration
programme.desc: Project Gemini: Docking and EVA - In the final phase of the Gemini program NASA struggles with docking and spacewalks. Curiosity Roving Mars - On the surface of Mars the Curiosity rover is changing the way we think about the red planet.
programme.sub-title: Project Gemini Docking, Mars Curiousity & Satellite Swarms

programme.title: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration
programme.desc: The Apollo Program Begins - At the very beginning of NASA's moon project things go wrong. Caves - ESA's special training program for astronauts. Planck - Mapping the cosmic microwave background radiation.
programme.sub-title: The Apollo Program Begins, Caves & Planck

programme.title: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration
programme.desc: Rebuilding Project Apollo - After the Apollo 1 disaster NASA resumes manned space flight. Orbiting Carbon Observatory 2 - Monitoring the Earth's Co2 levels in unprecedented detail. Zero Gravity Training - Parabolic flights.
programme.sub-title: Rebuilding Apollo, Orbiting Carbon & Zero Gravity Training

programme.desc: A New Mutant with the power of invisibility is working against both Eckhart and Adam, despite the fact she was involved with Adam in the past.

programme.title: Secret Dealers
programme.desc: A 19th-century Windsor chair in Oxfordshire has David Heckney and David Ford competing for the stronger bid. Also, a Berkshire homeowner learns about the history of her father's MBE.

programme.title: Secret Dealers
programme.desc: A recent retiree struggles to sell off her antique jewelry collection, and a woman tries to sell her nautical antiques inherited from her late husband so she can afford a vacation.

programme.title: Secret Dealers
programme.desc: Tim Hogarth and Allison Chapman bid big on some gold jewelry, and a South Yorkshire widow has a hard time letting go of her antiques including a Bohemian glass centerpiece.

programme.title: Secret Dealers
programme.desc: A Derbyshire homeowner looks to downsize but struggles to sell off her prized crown derby figurine collection. Also, a Cheshire homeowner sells off his late wife's antiques.

programme.title: Secret Dealers
programme.desc: The secret dealers give the largest amount they've ever offered for a woman's family heirlooms. Also, Karen Dalmeny and Simon Schneider are forced to up their bids on a foxhunting print.

programme.title: Secret Dealers
programme.desc: Oxfordshire antique collectors expect to sell a Victorian salt cellar set, and all three dealers bid on a set of wind-up monkey toys from the homeowner's childhood that still bring her nostalgia.

programme.title: Secret Dealers
programme.desc: Stewart Hofgartner bids on an architectural plant while Simon Schneider and Karen Dalmeny compete for the same items, including a Victorian Canterbury.

programme.title: Secret Dealers
programme.desc: A Derbyshire couple considers a cash offer for a tortoiseshell snuff box, and one of the dealers puts a bid in for a Solihull family's front door.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Where's Grandad?
programme.desc: 65-year-old Alan Gordon Woodford of Bedford St. Mossburn left his home on foot Saturday morning April 20, 1985 and was never seen or heard of again.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Looking for Justice
programme.desc: This week, for the first time ever, the prime suspect in a murder enquiry has turned to Sensing Murder for help.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: The Lie of the Land
programme.desc: Sue Nicholson and Deb Webber investigate one of the most complex and intriguing cases ever featured - did Waikato man Jason Dark commit suicide or was he murdered, as his family believes?

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Taken for a Ride
programme.desc: 54 year old Simon Buis was savagely beaten and kicked to death in an Auckland park in 1980 by persons unknown. To this day, his killers have evaded capture.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Vanishing Point
programme.desc: In 2003, 32-year-old mother of three Sara Neithe vanished from the Hauraki Plains. Neither Sara nor her car have been seen since. Police suspect that Sara has been murdered but without a crime scene, they have been unable to advance the case.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Girl in The Ditch
programme.desc: When 12 year old Agnes Ali'iva'a drowned in a ditch in 1992, the police initially thought her death was accidental. It was four years before public and political pressure forced police to re-investigate her death.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Into Thin Air
programme.desc: Jim Donnelly was a hard-working family man living a quiet life in suburban Auckland. For 20 years he’d worked as a scientist at the Glenbrook Steel Mill, south of Auckland. On the 21st of June 2004, he simply vanished into thin air.

programme.title: Beauty and the Geek Australia: Episode 5
programme.desc: The six remaining beauties and geeks compete in a joint challenge in the form of a beauty pageant, where the geeks appear in a catwalk parade dressed only in Budgy Smuggler swimwear.

programme.title: Beauty and the Geek Australia: Episode 6
programme.desc: The six beauties put their knowledge of geography to the test in a challenge where one incorrect answer will see them eliminated and their geek given a wedgie.

programme.title: Beauty and the Geek Australia: Episode 7
programme.desc: The five remaining beauties put their number skills to the test in a car wash mathematics challenge.

programme.title: Beauty and the Geek Australia: Episode 8
programme.desc: The six beauties face their fears while having to solve picture puzzles of their geek's idols.

programme.title: Beauty and the Geek Australia: Episode 9
programme.desc: The five remaining geeks have to saddle up for a rodeo challenge involving mustering their "cattle" beauties around an obstacle course, riding a mechanical bull, and a horse race.

programme.title: Beauty and the Geek Australia: Episode 10
programme.desc: The final four geeks face a medieval challenge in which the geeks have their courage, strength and nerve tested when they take on their rivals in a Segway joust, the beauties each have to woo a frog with a kiss and a sonnet.

programme.title: Beauty and the Geek Australia: Episode 2
programme.desc: The Geeks will be forced outside their comfort zone when let loose in a holiday resort’s swimming pool area packed with bikini clad tourists.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Kid for Ransom / Tears for Daniel
programme.desc: We examine two notorious abduction cases. The first case is the Graeme Thorne ransom kidnapping at Bondi in 1960. Thorne, aged eight, was the son of winners of the Sydney Opera House Lottery.
programme.sub-title: Kid for Ransom / Tears for Daniel

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Devil Inside: John Ernest Cribb
programme.desc: A chilling investigation of John Ernest Cribb, who on August 11, 1978 broke into the home of the Connell's. On a winter’s afternoon, Valda Connell and her four-year-old son Damien arrived home after having collected ten-year-old Sally from school.
programme.sub-title: The Devil Inside: John Ernest Cribb

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Hunt for a Killer: The Claremont Murders

programme.sub-title: Hunt for a Killer: The Claremont Murders

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Moorhouse Horrors / The Call Girl Killing
programme.desc: We investigate the story of David and Catherine Birnie, Australia's most sadistic husband and wife killing team, who tortured, raped and murdered four women in 1986.
programme.sub-title: The Moorhouse Horrors / The Call Girl Killing

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Snowtown: Bodies in the Barrels
programme.desc: In 1999, eight bodies are found in six barrels filled with acid in a former bank vault in rural Snowtown, 50 kilometres north of Adelaide.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Night Caller: Eric Edgar Cooke

programme.sub-title: The Night Caller: Eric Edgar Cooke

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Ivan Milat: The Backpacker Murders
programme.desc: The backpacker murder case in the Belanglo State Forest, south west of Sydney, has entered Australian criminal folklore.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mother Knows Best
programme.desc: Dog has two fugitives to catch, and he gets help from the unlikeliest sources - the fugitives' mothers. First, Ginger's mother wants to revoke her daughter's bond. Then, Brandon's mother decides to revoke his bond because Brandon has an ice habit.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Irons in the Fire
programme.desc: Dog is back hunting in the big city of Denver, but chasing fugitives on the mainland is more dangerous than ever. So Dog decides that the crew should get pepper-ball guns, which have much better range than pepper spray.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rocky Mountain Roundup
programme.desc: Dog decides to help two of his bondsmen buddies, Dave "Red" Widhelm and "Downtown" Bobby Brown. First up is Red, who has a client, named Alvin, whose bond is $20,000. Then the team goes after Craig, a client of Bobby's whose bond is almost $70,000.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: This One's For You
programme.desc: Dog leads the team on another adrenaline-filled chase in Denver. The fugitive, Robert, has a habit of address-hopping that makes him a difficult target, but Dog refuses to give up and finally tracks Robert down in his latest hideaway.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Baby Lyssa Steps Up
programme.desc: The team is still in Colorado, and today Dog starts his day by to giving his kids and crew a sample of their western heritage by taking them horseback riding. This hunt takes Dog back to his old stomping grounds in Denver.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Running on Empty
programme.desc: Dog's time is running out in Colorado. After a month of helping his bail bondsmen friends around Denver, he's got to get his family back home to Hawaii. But Dog wants one more capture before they leave.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Inside Out
programme.desc: Dog kickstarts the search for Jackson, a 240lbs, six feet tall bad boy who has skipped out on a $10,000 bond. Jackson’s apparently at his father-in-law's house, but the father-in-law has info about Jackson that brings Dog to a unique hideout.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Growing Up Is Hard To Do
programme.desc: With twelve kids of his own, Dog knows how hard it is to keep children on the straight and narrow, especially during their turbulent teens.
programme.sub-title: Growing Up Is Hard To Do

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Year of the Dog
programme.desc: A one-hour special that looks back at 2006, one of Dog's most tumultuous years, which has included the passing of Beth's father, Dog and Beth's wedding, the tragic death of Dog's daughter Barbara.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Mystery of Mona Lisa
programme.desc: When Lyssa points out that the fugitive in the next case has the same birth date as Barbara, Dog's recently deceased daughter, the team takes a special vow to capture the young woman.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rusty Cuffs
programme.desc: Dog finds himself fighting two enemies; the law and his inner demons. He continues his legal battle to fight extradition to Mexico in connection with his 2003 capture of fugitive rapist Andrew Luster. His other struggle is private.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Make a Wish
programme.desc: Dog shows his love of justice and children in this poignant episode. He begins by giving encouragement to a group of handicapped children, then starting the search for Jacob, a fugitive who's abandoned his wife and children.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Friday Afternoon Lights
programme.desc: When Willie becomes an assistant coach on Lil' Will's struggling football team, his authority is tested when the kids challenge the adults to a scrimmage. Meanwhile, Kay brings Jep and Si to an aquarobics class at a local health club.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Master and Duck Commander
programme.desc: When Jase and the guys transform an old pontoon boat into a floating duck blind, they are faced with the impending question of whether or not it will actually float. Meanwhile, Kay's dog Bobo misbehaves.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Inlawful Entry
programme.desc: When Missy's parents visit, her father convinces Jase to take him on a quail hunt. But while their "bonding hunt" yields very few quail, it does bring them closer together as friends. Meanwhile, Willie helps John Luke start his own snow cone business.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Flock and Key
programme.desc: Si recruits his nephews to help him transport a storage container to his backyard, but things take a turn when Jep becomes locked inside the box. Meanwhile, Jase helps Mia prepare for her cheerleading competition, but the only problem is he has no idea.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ball in the Family
programme.desc: When Willie's old rival Phillip McMillan challenges him to a game of dodgeball, Willie recruits his family members to settle a score once and for all. Meanwhile, Si thinks his cat is cheating on him with another family, so he recruits Miss Kay.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drone Survivor
programme.desc: When Jase and Phil make a bet about whether or not human beings in a duck blind are visible from the air, Jep buys a drone copter to get a "bird's eye" view, but ends up losing it in the process.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Alan in Charge
programme.desc: Jase and the guys convince Willie to hire his older brother Alan to work at Duck Commander, but when Alan begins micromanaging everyone, they quickly change their mind. Meanwhile, the ladies take a self-defense class and use John Luke as a punching bag.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Renaissance Men
programme.desc: When the Robertsons throw a Renaissance Fair birthday party for Godwin, various family members compete in a tournament to win knighthood.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Heroes Welcome
programme.desc: In this special episode, the Duck Commander team surprises two wounded veterans with a trip to Monroe so they can be in an episode of Duck Dynasty. To show their support, the Robertson family stages a color run to bring awareness to our wounded soldiers.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Pie Hard
programme.desc: Willie and Alan agree to help Miss Kay open her own bakery, but things take a turn when Kay is asked to hand over her secret recipes. Meanwhile, the guys in the duck call room take an extended lunch break by driving to Mississippi.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Van He'llsing
programme.desc: When Missy and Jase's son Reed purchases an old van to boost his music career, his parents begin to question some of his choices. Meanwhile, Willie helps Jep prepare River for a competitive wrestling league by introducing him to his friend.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Toad to Perdition
programme.desc: When Willie and his brothers spend too much time frog hunting, their wives challenge them to a "frogging" competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: RV There Yet?
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a road trip to Liberty University where they will drop off John Luke and Mary Kate for their first year of college. Along the way, they stop in Nashville to visit Willie's friend Colt Ford.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Willie & Korie's Anniversorry
programme.desc: The Robertson family throws a party for Willie & Korie's 25th anniversary, but things take a dramatic turn when Willie and Korie reveal a big secret. Meanwhile, when Jase blames Uncle Si for getting him a parking ticket.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Statue of Imitations
programme.desc: When Willie asks a local chainsaw artist to make him a statue, he gets a big surprise when it's revealed that the statue is of an unlikely subject - Willie himself. Meanwhile, Jep and Jessica attempt to help Kay with her hoarding.

programme.title: Deadliest Journeys: Argentina
programme.desc: A dairy farmer drives his Mad Max style lorry - half bus, half tractor - through swamped lagoons to deliver his farm's milk.

programme.title: License to Drill: They're back
programme.desc: Two fearless crews brave harsh weather to drill for oil in the frozen Canadian North.

programme.title: Ax Men: High Wire Act
programme.desc: In Louisiana, Shelby looks to repair his custom made two-ton swamp buggy. In Alaska, Coatsy returns to the Papac worksite. In the Pacific Northwest, the Rygaard crew must climb over a hundred feet in the air to top a new lift tree.

programme.title: Ax Men: The Log and Winding Road
programme.desc: In Louisiana, Shelby and his assistant Bob head out looking for logs on his newly repaired two-ton swamp buggy. In Central Florida, the Chapman crew goes to battle against the legendary "Gump" log - the biggest challenge of their career.

programme.title: Ax Men: Swamp Man Boogie
programme.desc: Deep in the Bayou, Shelby hits Lake Ponchartrain with Belinda and Bob to retrieve a massive log he marked years ago. In Florida, it's round two between Chapman and the legendary Gump log.

programme.title: Ax Men: Teepee of Death
programme.desc: In Washington, Rygaard's remaining veterans go old school to keep the team on track. Deep in the Bayou, Shelby and Bob discover a valuable sinker cypress, but reeling it in is easier said then done.

programme.title: Ax Men: Old Log New Tricks
programme.desc: In the Louisiana Bayou, Shelby Stanga's jet boat is in desperate need of repair and he needs to find logs to buy a new engine.

programme.title: Ax Men: All's Fair in Loggin' War
programme.desc: Down in the swamps of Louisiana, Shelby Stanga is trying to upgrade his logging empire, so he takes a risk and tries out some new equipment.

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: Gambling the Friendship
programme.desc: Daryl is suing his former friend for missing belongings that he believes were sold to fuel Rashain's gambling addiction. Rashain claims that they live in a bad neighborhood and the items were stolen.

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: Savage Kindness
programme.desc: Kim Savage claims her brother John owes her rent and money for appliances, while John argues that he paid the rent and wants to be compensated for the emotional distress he encountered when he and his three children were tossed out on the street.

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: Welcome to the Flea Circus
programme.desc: Jasmine wants the return of a security deposit and recompense for flea-induced pain and suffering. Drayson claims Jasmine brought the fleas in herself and is counter suing her for 1 months rent.

programme.title: Judge Karen's Court: Love Bites
programme.desc: Kent loaned Elizabath five grand to help pay for her dental work but it took a bitter bite out of their red hot relationship when he asked for his money back.

programme.title: Eye for an Eye Series: The Mischievous Mover
programme.desc: A woman asks for a hand while moving her apartment, but what she got was a five finger discount that lifted everything in her possession. The defendant says he handled the situation with gloves, and that she's the one with meddling mittens.

programme.title: Eye for an Eye Series: She Said, She Said
programme.desc: In this episode, we'll meet two star crossed lovers who battle over bills after a relationship gone bad. And if you think this is just another case of he said, she said, then think again!

programme.title: Eye for an Eye Series: The Distracted Drivers
programme.desc: A pair of distracted drivers wrestle over their right-of-way. Each claims to have seen green as they drove into their destination of disaster.

programme.title: Eye for an Eye Series: The Honeymoon Came Early
programme.desc: A bitter bride stirs a feud with her maid of dishonor one night before the wedding. It seems monogamy was not on the mind of the would-be groom.

programme.title: Eye for an Eye Series: A Pudding Proposal
programme.desc: This episode features a dynamic duo, duling over a diamond in the rough. He says when the money ran out, so did she. These two are caught between a rock and a hard place.

programme.title: Eye for an Eye Series: The Peek-A-Boo Painter
programme.desc: The defendant simply wanted her house painted, and the plaintiff claims, she was out to paint the town. Watch as these colorful litigants stand off!

programme.title: Eye for an Eye Series: A Pain in My Glass
programme.desc: In this episode, a child's baseball hits issues that seems black and white. What should've been an open and shut case was anything but!

programme.title: Eye for an Eye Series: The Company Cabaret
programme.desc: A former employee complains that her employer turned the workplace into a raunchy club! He claims she was a poor performer, but she says she didn't sign up for this kind of show!

programme.title: Emergency
programme.desc: An overloaded sail boat capsizes during a rescue attempt on the high seas. Plus, firefighters courageously battle stubborn flames, helping a restaurant filled with patrons. And, an elephant goes berserk in front of terrified spectators.

programme.title: Emergency
programme.desc: Gasoline on a barbecue grill, now a victim fights to live. 70% of his body is burned and paramedics need to get him to a hospital quickly. Plus, saving a life 35,000 feet in the air.

programme.title: Emergency
programme.desc: A woman in full cardiac arrest fights for her life. Plus, a small child is hit by a car. And, a baby's life hangs in the balance.

programme.title: Emergency
programme.desc: A rescue crew dangerously low on fuel, attempt to save stranded boaters in the middle of the Atlantic Ocean. Plus, a young child is struck by a hit-and-run driver. And, battling raging infernos in the desert.

programme.title: Emergency
programme.desc: An air rescue team rushes to save passengers after their vehicle flips over. Plus, a woman's life hangs in the balance as medical crews attempt to save her. And, pumping iron or water skiing, busy firefighters relieve their stress.

programme.title: Clubbing Experience - Series 3: KLYMVX - Best of French by DJ Mag France @ Zigzag club Paris
programme.desc: Back to the Best of French by DJ Mag France party at Zig Zag Club Paris. The duet KLYMVX was playing some good records!
programme.sub-title: KLYMVX - Best of French by DJ Mag France @ Zigzag club Paris

programme.desc: Brazilian brothers Lugui and Pedrão, aka Cat Dealers were performing on the mainstage at Nameless Music Festival! We promise, no cat has been harmed during this set!

programme.desc: A mesmerizing journey into a sci-fi universe.

programme.title: Black & White
programme.desc: Black & white imagery for a classy, sophisticated atmosphere.

programme.title: Summer Fun
programme.desc: Sizzling, relaxing, visual vacation.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: The Dirty Denial
programme.desc: Vinny is in an unusually good mood and causes everyone concern. Plans to open the living facility come to a halt when Vinny receives disturbing news. (S1, ep25)

programme.title: Black Card Revoked: 101
programme.desc: Based on the popular new home game, Black Card Revoked is a comedic, celebrity-driven panel game show that dives into everything about black culture. From black history to the ever growing catalogue of pop culture events, happenings, and trends.

programme.title: Black Card Revoked: 102
programme.desc: Based on the popular new home game, Black Card Revoked is a comedic, celebrity-driven panel game show that dives into everything about black culture. From black history to the ever growing catalogue of pop culture events, happenings, and trends.

programme.title: Black Card Revoked: 103
programme.desc: Based on the popular new home game, Black Card Revoked is a comedic, celebrity-driven panel game show that dives into everything about black culture. From black history to the ever growing catalogue of pop culture events, happenings, and trends.

programme.title: Being Mary Jane: Facing Fears
programme.desc: When Mary Jane is rushed to the hospital after her accident the family rallies around her. Paul Sr. handles David, and Helen unburdens them of Lisa while Kara fights for Mary Jane at SNC. (S3, ep1)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: The Yellow Dress
programme.desc: Gary and Jasmine confront each other and the gloves come off. Andi struggles to maintain her career. Karen is confronted by a new enemy. Sabrina grows frustrated. (S1, ep22)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Home For A Queen
programme.desc: The ladies are concerned about Andi and her relationship choice. Sabrina stands strong for all of her friends who seem to be under attack. (S1, ep23)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: A Bad Feeling
programme.desc: The ladies are worried about Andi and her relationship. Karen tries to figure out what she wants. Sabrina tends to Calvin in his time of need. Danni tries to move on from her hurt feelings. (S1, ep24)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: The Long Road
programme.desc: Andi's world is turned upside down when hidden revelations rise to the surface. Karen is in a fight for her life. Sabrina aims to protect the ones she loves. (S1, ep25)

programme.title: Being Mary Jane: Louie Louie
programme.desc: Stuck in the house with nothing else to do, a new set of problems arise for Mary Jane when Cece reveals her plans to extort her. Meanwhile, SNC hires Marisol, a new, young replacement. (S3, ep2)

programme.title: Being Mary Jane: Sparrow
programme.desc: When Mary Jane gets the devastating news of the death of a loved one, she'll be forced to confront her life choices, deal with her family and face David. (S3, ep3)

programme.title: Paranormal State: I Am Six
programme.desc: Laura has felt oppressed by a violent spirit ever since she heard a chilling EVP in the fall of 2007. The 26-year-old claims she's been beaten, choked, even forcibly submerged.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Shape Shifter
programme.desc: PRS travels to Shapleigh, Maine where a woman and her daughter are reporting attacks from a winged creature with sharp teeth. Psychic Chip Coffey arrives and senses a half-human, half animal presence.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Ghost On the Tracks
programme.desc: PRS is called to a New Jersey beauty salon, but they soon learn that the building's proximity to deadly train tracks might be the true cause of spirit activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Permission To Do Harm
programme.desc: When a mirror levitates and shatters on its own, P.R.S. heeds the call to investigate a spirit that has been unleashed on an unsuspecting family. Ryan must track down the spirit and contain it before it does irreparable damage.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Fury
programme.desc: Kathy, her two daughters and her new husband, "Farmer" thought they had the perfect, quiet life deep in the mountains of West Virginia.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Smoke and Shadows
programme.desc: Sarah believes her Parkville, MD home has been invaded by a powerful force ever since her roommate Dennis moved in. PRS investigates claims that Dennis has been attacked by the entity, a possible poltergeist.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Do Bad Things
programme.desc: After receiving a letter requesting PRS' help, Ryan and the team head to Ohio to help a grieving family and determine if the family's house contributed to the untimely death of a daughter.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dark Practice
programme.desc: Brenda is terrified by a dark hooded figure spotted in her West Virginia home. The same entity allegedly tormented her late husband. PRS and Psychic/Medium Michelle Belanger help Brenda before she slips into the same abyss as her late husband.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Firehouse
programme.desc: Everyone from the chief to the trainees at the Clementon Fire Department is convinced that the ghost of a former member is haunting their firehouse.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Freshmen Fear
programme.desc: A young female student claims to have seen a ghost in her dorm room.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dark Man
programme.desc: A grieving mother suspects her deceased son may have fallen victim to a mysterious entity called The Dark Man.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Spirits of the Slave Dungeon
programme.desc: Ryan books a two-night case in a real haunted jail in Charleston, SC, but PRS soon realizes the spirits themselves are being held there against their will and subjected to an unjust form of torture.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Bedroom Eyes
programme.desc: PRS travels to rural Pennsylvania to investigate a haunting that began after a new couple moved into an old family farm.?Over the next three days, hidden tragedies are uncovered and latent psychic abilities are revealed.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Anniversary
programme.desc: Ever since a close-knit Kentucky family moved into their new home, they've been visited by the spirit of a young girl.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dwelling of the Dead
programme.desc: A single mom claims she is being physically assaulted by a spirit in her Kentucky home. Ryan first explores a natural explanation for the alleged phenomena. But the client's five-year-old son also sees spirits, and his sightings appear to line up.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Culzean Castle
programme.desc: Culzean Castle in Ayrshire, Scotland is supposed to be haunted by seven ghosts. Derek arrives and takes the crew straight to the most haunted room in the house, the Earl of Cassillis's bedroom.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Mermaid Inn
programme.desc: The ghosts of smugglers terrify the crew when they spend 24 hours at the Mermaid Inn. A haunted chair moves on its own and reports of ghostly men fighting a duel a bedrooms spur the team on.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Blackpool Pleasure Beach
programme.desc: The team spends 24 hours at Blackpool's famous funfair to investigate a haunted ghost train and poltergeist activity. Derek sees ghostly children in the gift shop and phantom footsteps are heard.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Treasure Holt House
programme.desc: Stories of witchcraft, murder and human sacrifice bring the team to Treasure Holt. Derek is guided by the spirit of a monk and contacts two of the ghosts seen in what was once a house of disrepute.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Derby Gaol
programme.desc: Historian Richard Felix joins Yvette and the team as they are locked inside Derby Gaol, where scenes of total incarceration and brutal executions have taken place since 1756.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Aldwych Underground Station
programme.desc: Yvette and Jason dress up in 1940s army uniforms as they investigate Aldwych Station, which was built after demolishing a theatre in 1907, and used as an air raid shelter during WWII.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Charleville Forest Castle
programme.desc: Located in the center of Ireland, Charleville Forest Castle is built on the site of an ancient burial ground where plague victims were buried in the 1700s. The team holds a Victorian-style séance.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Michelam Priory
programme.desc: Michelam Priory was originally a church built on a medieval moated island. In 1556 it was transformed into a house where many families have lived through history and tragedy.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Brannigans Nightclub, Manchester
programme.desc: The team investigates reports of considerable poltergeist activity and spectral sighting. They encounter two entities that did not want a television crew in the building, according to Derek.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Tutbury Castle, Staffordshire
programme.desc: Tutbury is an ancient castle steeped in bloody history, which once held Mary, Queen of Scots. During their 24-hour vigil, the team hopes to encounter a ghostly lady and meet historian Lesley Smith.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Station Hotel, Dudley
programme.desc: The team returns to Dudley, this time to investigate the Station Hotel. Since its opening in 1910, the hotel has welcomed many famous guests, but is said to be haunted by the ghost of a murdered maid.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Banker and The Bum
programme.desc: A greedy banker and a good-hearted bum switch places. The bum dies, but the banker is now infused with love and generosity.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Brightest Star
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark meet a child star whose fame is spoiling her rotten, destroying her family and taking away her childhood.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Investment In Caring
programme.desc: Jonathan encourages residents in a neighborhood to unite against a cold-hearted developer.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Right Thing
programme.desc: Jonathan inspires a young man to help the grandfather who has recently been placed in a nursing home.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Thoroughbreds - Part 1
programme.desc: Lizzy MacGill is a horse trainer's young daughter who elopes with Garth Armstrong, a privileged man.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Thoroughbreds - Part 2
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark try to help Lizzie. The new bride has cancer and she is pregnant.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Song for Jason - Part 1
programme.desc: Mark and Jonathan become counselors at a camp for children with cancer.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Hope for the Best
programme.desc: Hope is a dedicated single parent who has been told she dresses too old for her age. Along with the daily stresses of work and motherhood, the recent loss of Hope's mother's has also taken its toll on her appearance.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Felicia Gets Her Groove Back
programme.desc: After the death of both her mother and boyfriend, Felicia is trying to get back her zest for life. She has surrendered to the experts on hand to help her jump back into her old self. Will she rebound for a slam-dunk makeover?

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Standing Up To Her Past
programme.desc: Norma Jean is a single, working mother of two whom by night makes audiences laugh as a stand-up comic, but worries that her tired and worn down appearance may be what they're laughing at instead.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger UK: Debbie Ashcroft
programme.desc: 46 year old Debbie Ashcroft is a lifelong smoker and sunbed addict with the peculiar habit of bleaching her hair up to six times a week. Can the expect team make Debbie look 10 years younger?

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Head Of The Class
programme.desc: A painful divorce has undermined Cindy's confidence, but she's trying to start life over. Experts boost her looks and her morale.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Tomboy to 10
programme.desc: Stephanie is an avid soccer player, but she doesn't get much of a kick out of life anymore. Stephanie's worst fear about her appearance is her teeth, or rather her missing tooth and she also thinks her skin is aging prematurely.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: The Most Revealing Reveal Ever
programme.desc: After years of sunbathing, Stefanie hid her sun-damaged skin under frumpy and matronly clothes. But after a flurry of skin treatments, Stefanie stuns her family and friends at one of our most revealing reveals ever!

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: A Budding New Look
programme.desc: When Rose was growing up, she was called "the ugliest girl" at her high school. Even though she is now grown up and has a loving fiancé, those cruel comments from her past still haunt her.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger New Zealand: Jason Searell
programme.desc: Jason Searell admits he's let himself go, and he's gone a long way. Jason needs a complete overhaul but can Fiona McDonald and her team of experts really knock off 10 years in just 10 days?

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: One Hot Pizza Guy To Go
programme.desc: Frank is a husband and father who has overcome hardships to start a small business of his own. But his decaying teeth give him an unwanted tough guy image because he never smiles. Frank's ready to shed the old image and start fresh.
programme.sub-title: One Hot Pizza Guy To Go

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Duty Calls
programme.desc: Kimberly met her husband in the Air Force. They lived an active lifestyle until his health forced him into a wheelchair. The stress of care giving and years of smoking has caught up to her and it's Kimberly's turn to receive some care.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Hair Today, Gone Tomorrow
programme.desc: Kim is a suburban wife and mother that never shook off the hippie-look of her youth. Now she longs for a more polished and sophisticated image than her long braid and wire-rimmed glasses.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger UK: Sue Chamberlain "One Year On"
programme.desc: Just a year ago, Sue Chamberlain was a 34 year old living in a 40 year old's body. Now, a year on, we retrace Sue's transformational journey – and pop in to pay Sue a return visit. Will she still be looking fabulous – or flabby?

programme.title: 10 Years Younger UK: Siobhan Wirdman
programme.desc: Step in Nicky Hambleton-Jones to rescue 37 year old Siobhan Wirdman and get this full time wife and mother to love herself and get her life back on track.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 10
programme.desc: Strange things are happening at Leopard's Den. The family awake to find frogs everywhere, seemingly having rained down overnight; the giraffe refuses to budge from the front gate and the cheetah is off its food.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 1
programme.desc: New Year's Eve at Leopard's Den. Alice has returned, but the stress of combining work with caring for baby Bobby is causing tension between her and Danny. Liv is furious that Fatani hasn't told his mother about their relationship.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Scabby Monkey
programme.desc: Contending with overweight cats and their over protective owners was not what Danny Trevanion had in mind when he became a vet. So when a scruffy, barely alive African monkey arrives at his practise Danny is fascinated by the challenge.

programme.title: Wild At Heart
programme.desc: Danny is having second thoughts about the wisdom of uprooting his new family and ploughing all their money into a business venture that they know next to nothing about.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Work To Do
programme.desc: A successful giraffe capture means everyone is in high spirits, until the arrival of Evan and Olivia's real father, Simon, throws the family into turmoil.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Meerly Evan
programme.desc: Evan lets the mischievous meerkats loose in Rosie's room to cause havoc. Rosie is devastated when they destroy an irreplaceable photograph of her mother and rages at Evan. She decides once and for all to go back to Bristol.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Evan Meets Elli
programme.desc: Rogue young male elephants are rampaging through Leopard's Den and destroying everything the family have built, so Danny introduces a matriarch elephant in the hope that she will calm them down.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 9
programme.desc: A hang glider pilot may have broken his back after a heavy crash-landing, a Manaia man is in a bad way after coming off a sea biscuit at high speed, and a crashed Waikato driver needs an urgent air-lift to hospital to save his life.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 10
programme.desc: A motocross rider may have broken his back after hitting a tree head on at high speed, at a sawmill a man faces its worse nightmares; and a woman is fighting for her life after taking an accidental overdose of her husband's medication.

programme.title: Air Rescue: Episode 3
programme.desc: A monster swell has trapped two teenage girls on the rocks at Sydney's North Head. As high-tide approaches, a daring double-winch rescue is their only option – to stop the teenagers from being swept out to sea.

programme.title: Air Rescue: Episode 4
programme.desc: 55-year-old Gold Coast holidaymaker Irina is in real trouble - she's caught in a deadly ocean rip. Like many tourists, Irena was unaware of the risks of not swimming between the beach flags. The Gold Coast rescue helicopter spots her in the nick of time.

programme.title: Air Rescue: Episode 5
programme.desc: A head-on car collision in Tasmania has left tourists Hong and Xeu Wu fighting for their lives. Ambulance crews have managed to stabilize Mr. Wu but Mrs. Wu is in a critical condition and calling out for her husband.

programme.title: The Embassy: Episode 4
programme.desc: Jarryd's been busted for drugs in a country where they still have the death penalty. And now he plans to double-cross the Thai authorities and escape to Singapore with his pregnant girlfriend.

programme.title: The Embassy: Episode 5
programme.desc: Beau was left for dead by the side of a road after a horrific motorbike crash. Now he wants to discharge himself from hospital. Can the embassy stop him before he self-destructs?

programme.title: The Embassy: Episode 6
programme.desc: The embassy visits a convicted drug dealer in the world's most notorious prison. But Steven claims he's the innocent victim of an undercover drug sting gone wrong.

programme.title: The Embassy: Episode 7
programme.desc: Young Rhys calls the embassy after his businessman father is arrested and jailed for fraud. Can Rhys raise the bail money to get him out of jail? It's a race against the clock.

programme.title: The Embassy: Episode 8
programme.desc: Ash contacts the embassy convinced he's going to die after days of partying. The notorious Thai bucket strikes again! The embassy needs to uncover the truth. Is he really in danger or is he suffering from alcohol poisoning?

programme.title: The Embassy: Episode 1
programme.desc: Nathan is in Phuket on a holiday of a lifetime, fuelled by sun, sex and steroids, when disaster strikes. 19-year-old Paris is on a gap year adventure of a lifetime. But just two months into her first-ever overseas holiday she's hit a big roadblock.

programme.title: The Embassy: Episode 2
programme.desc: Retired Army Officer, Ben arrives at the Embassy in tears. His young Thai wife has suddenly gone missing. Rodney has been having way too much of a good time in Vietnam. He's overstayed his visa and run up a $1,500 hotel bill.

programme.title: The Embassy: Episode 3
programme.desc: Music journalist, Illario the Lothario, is one of many foreign revelers who have come unstuck. His passport is drenched and no longer valid. He arrives to the Embassy, only to fall head over heals for a dashing Thai diplomat.

programme.title: Top Ten Show: The Most Affordable Hybrid Models
programme.desc: In today's show, we are going to show you the most affordable hybrid models. The trail-blazers are definitely the Japanese, who have a whole bunch of cars to offer.

programme.title: Top Ten Show: The Oldest Car Manufacturers
programme.desc: It’s time to get nostalgic: who do you think is the most important pioneer of the automotive world? We do a little time travel and trace back the trail of the modern car.

programme.title: Top Ten Show: The Greatest Car Legends
programme.desc: Some cars are not just a means of transport, but influenced entire generations and became legends on their own. That’s why we won’t talk about expensive, fast or successful cars on this episode.

programme.title: Top Ten Show: The Ugliest Cars
programme.desc: The car-manufacturers' design departments are constantly tinkering around, in a quest to invent the perfect car. And more often than not, very elegantly-shaped cars are the result.

programme.title: Top Ten Show: The Most Beautiful Cars
programme.desc: Today we are going for Lux. It has been said that beauty is in the eye of the beholder. So we promise to maintain some objectivity. Desirable cars are what we want, and what we shall get.

programme.title: Top Ten Show: The Rarest Automobiles
programme.desc: Most manufacturers sell their models in other countries. The production figures, therefore, easily rise into the hundreds of thousands.

programme.title: Top Ten Show: The Best Sport Versions of Small Cars
programme.desc: Almost every compact car is now available in a sporty version. And funnily enough the little racers usually have more power under the bonnet than you might think.
programme.sub-title: The Best Sport Versions of Small Cars

programme.title: Track Masters: Episode 01
programme.desc: An angry bull, a few English people prepared for the weather and a young, talented race driver - tourists will be venturing down to the infamous 'green hell' of the Nürburgring!

programme.title: Track Masters: Episode 02
programme.desc: A tuned-up Golf 2, a family sedan from Hannover, Germany and a very special Porsche GT2! We will be looking behind the scenes of the gas station by the curve on the race track where sports cars flock!

programme.title: Track Masters: Episode 03
programme.desc: The Nürburgring has transformed into a winter wonderland, but although it looks pretty it sure is not pretty to use it as a race track.

programme.title: Track Masters: Episode 04
programme.desc: Fog, rain and snow means that a visit to the Eifel region is not that pleasant right now. Nevertheless, the hardcore drivers are out of the track and are not letting the weather get in their way.

programme.title: Track Masters: Episode 05
programme.desc: The Nürburgring. Here you can really let your hair down on a spectacular and difficult race track and learn how to get fit for motor sports. That is why motor fans come here to the Nürburgring throughout the year!

programme.title: Track Masters: Episode 06
programme.desc: On today's episode, we will be treating you to some very entertaining clips from the Nürburgring. Expect to see the pedal on the metal and rubber burning up the place!

programme.title: Track Masters: Episode 07
programme.desc: The weather has cleared up a bit on the Nürburgring and we are finally back on the track. As soon as the snow and ice has gone the horsepower junkies return to the ring to tear it up once again.

programme.title: Tastemade Live
programme.desc: Tastemade, a livestream filled with tons of food, travel and design inspiration! Award-winning food, travel, and home & design shows from around the world - from groundbreaking originals to classic series and documentaries?

programme.desc: Tastemade, a livestream filled with tons of food, travel and design inspiration! Award-winning food, travel, and home & design shows from around the world - from groundbreaking originals to classic series and documentaries?

programme.title: Tastemade Live

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Live Free or Die
programme.desc: Navy Seal major Raymond McIntyre kidnaps Da'an and demands to know where his men are. They were involved in a inter-dimensional space flight test that went wrong.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Secret of Standhill
programme.desc: An Irish guide finds the possible burial location of Ma'el, a Taelon that came to Earth 2000 years ago. It is crucial for the Taelons to find his research material.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Devil You Know
programme.desc: While a dying colonel implants his brain in a deceased criminal, the Taelons show a new electromagnetic pulse weapon. Jonathan Doors wishes to acquire it.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Law and Order
programme.desc: The Synod agrees to let Rho'ha be charged with murder in a human court. He will be prosecuted by Joshua Doors, the son of Jonathan Doors.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Through the Looking Glass
programme.desc: A new inter-dimensional portal system for human travel turns out to be something more when the resistance discover a CVI in a boy who got lost in the system.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Infection
programme.desc: Ne'eg is killed by a bacteria that is both deadly to Taelons and Humans. If it spreads, it might be disastrous. A new racist group attacks a community center.

programme.title: Dark Matter

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Death Rains Down
programme.desc: Restaurant worker Sharon Coleman is murdered in a hail of large caliber gunfire. Kenda must break through a web of lies to hunt down one of the most dangerous criminal masterminds he’s ever faced.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Blood Red Highway
programme.desc: The elderly owners of a local grocery are attacked and left for dead. Working with a vague witness description, Lt. Joe Kenda leads a state-wide manhunt to catch a pair of cold-blooded killers.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Fate Worst Than Death
programme.desc: At the bottom of a steep ravine, joggers discover a body mutilated beyond recognition. To catch a ruthless maniac, Lt. Joe Kenda must first solve the puzzle of the victim’s identity.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: The Master Key
programme.desc: When a pregnant mother and her two young sons are brutally slain, pressure mounts for the CSPD to catch the cold-blooded monster who did it.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: #1 Suspect
programme.desc: Lt. Joe Kenda must somehow solve a stranger-on-stranger crime with just a composite sketch of the killer and a mysterious bouquet of flowers.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Magic Bullet
programme.desc: A hard-working father of two is shot in the head just steps from a notorious strip club. The case is stuck in neutral until Kenda uncovers a conspiracy organized by an unlikely triggerman.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: A Prayer for the Dying
programme.desc: A mother of two is found dead in the most expensive part of Colorado Springs, leaving Lt. Joe Kenda stumped—until he looks into her personal life.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Hyde & Vada and Nacho
programme.desc: Hyde and Vada, both wolf hybrids have aggression issues to work out especially when it comes to other dogs. Nacho, bit a child, and shows aggression when he has his toy.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Bullying Bulldog
programme.desc: Bulldog Buster is prone to biting and growling. Sadie, a 3 month old Beagle/terrier mix, is frightened of trash cans. Lacey develops anxiety at 11 years of age.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Pasha, Cosmo, and Contessa
programme.desc: Pasha lashes out at people, especially children. Cosmo’s bitten several people including the postman. Contessa is highly aggressive towards TV shows, especially Dog Whisperer.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Dexter and Nasir
programme.desc: A Chicago art teacher wants to unify her adopted Rottweiler/shepherd’s dual personality. Singer Patti LaBelle is afraid of her guard dog, an aggressive 150-pound South African boerboel.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Chloe, Gotti and Madison
programme.desc: A Border Collie/Greyhound mix develops dog aggression; an inherited pooch who was raised "Cesar's Way" loses his confidence; and 150 pound Leonberger, Madison, is like a bull in a china shop.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Goldie & Pepsi
programme.desc: Pepsi, a German Shepherd, becomes intensely aggressive around cats. Goldie, the beautiful Brittany Spaniel of “General Hospital” star Jacklyn Zeman that has become aggressive towards female dogs.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Maxwell, Brooklyn, and Tipper
programme.desc: A spoiled Welsh Sealyham Terrier has dominance issues; an excitable English Mastiff has behavioral issues, and a territorial Tibetan Terrier needs help accepting other dogs.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Baby Girl
programme.desc: Suzie Dove Miles, a "cat whisperer," is set on getting a fearful Doberman mix at a shelter. Suzie has tried many of Cesar's exercises with Baby Girl, but needs Cesar’s expertise to help Baby Girl become a real dog.

programme.title: My Crazy Obsession: Raggedy Ann_A Rat's Tale
programme.desc: Chantal’s 19 pet rats are more than just pets; she considers them her children. Robyn loves to share her obsession with Raggedy Ann and she tries to convert new Raggedy believers.

programme.title: My Crazy Obsession: 5,000 Kids_Tickled Pink
programme.desc: Pat and Joe are passionate about their extreme collection of over 5,000 infamous kid dolls. Kitty Kay Sera is completely obsessed with the color pink. She even wears pink clothes and eats pink food.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Ventriloquist/Cat Lady
programme.desc: April's addiction to her puppets has gotten so strong she can't go anywhere without them. Debbie is severely allergic to cats, but has over twenty of them, leaving her in isolation.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Eats Detergent/Strongman
programme.desc: 19-year-old Tempestt eats detergent up to seven times a day, not to mention the soap she eats in the shower. Meanwhile, Jeff is addicted to strongman competitions training up to six hours a day.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Addicted to Coffee Enemas/Licks Cats
programme.desc: Trina and her husband Mike have done nearly 7,000 coffee enemas over the last two and a half years. Lisa has been addicted to licking her cat and eating clumps of its hair for three years.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Loves Baby Wipes/Eats Sand
programme.desc: Riah has been addicted to baby wipes since she was 15 and goes through up to 500 every day. Brea has been addicted to eating sand for the past 5 years.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Vapor Rubs/Eats Tires
programme.desc: Danielle has been addicted to vapor rub for more than twenty years, going through more than 30 jars, inhalers and patches every week. Allison has been eating tires for the past six years.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: The Lamb/Eats Deodorant
programme.desc: Nicole has been addicted to eating deodorant for two years, consuming fifteen sticks per month. 27-year-old Audrey can't live without her stuffed lamb.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Pony Play / Addicted to Drinking Paint
programme.desc: For the past 20 years, Nicole has been addicted to Pony Play. Meanwhile, 43-year-old single mother of two Heather has been addicted to drinking paint for nearly three years.
programme.sub-title: Pony Play / Addicted to Drinking Paint

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Proud to be Plastic
programme.desc: Lacey, a 44-year-old mother of six has had at least 30 plastic surgery procedures and spent more than $250,000 building the most extreme body in the world.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Chews Dirty Diapers / Addicted to Leeches
programme.desc: 22-year-old Keyshia is addicted to chewing on urine-soaked diapers. Vladimir, a 50-year-old man, who uses leeches up to 40 times a year.
programme.sub-title: Chews Dirty Diapers / Addicted to Leeches

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Addicted to a Doll/Eats Plastic Bags
programme.desc: Robert, a 23-year-old man who's addicted to eating plastic newspaper bags, an addition so intense, that he goes days without food. Catherine, a 48-year-old woman whose best friend is a doll.
programme.sub-title: Addicted to a Doll/Eats Plastic Bags

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Married to a Doll/Picking My Scabs
programme.desc: Davecat has been married to his synthetic wife for 10 years. Meanwhile, Rachael hopes that her compulsive scab picking will stop by her wedding day.
programme.sub-title: Married to a Doll/Picking My Scabs

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Eats Couch Cushion/Furry
programme.desc: While battling her addiction to eating couch cushions, Adele has destroyed 7 couches and 2 chairs. Meanwhile, Lauren is more comfortable in her fur suit than in her own skin.

programme.title: Buying Alaska: No Roads In
programme.desc: Dave and Wendy want a remote cabin where they can escape to the Alaskan frontier way of life, places so hidden that the only way there is by off-road vehicle and no outhouse is safe from hungry bears.

programme.title: Buying Alaska: Jaws, Claws & Beaver Fever
programme.desc: Shane and Erica want a home in the Alaskan wild, where it’s so remote, the only way in is by a monster 8-wheeler. Homeowners beware! Bears attack the properties and beavers infect the drinking water.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Hot Tubs and Gators
programme.desc: Duck, Lathan, & Flip are tired of traveling each weekend to their favorite place to enjoy bayou living. They’re willing to do anything to buy a home if they can hunt gators right out their back door.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Lakes for the Champ
programme.desc: “Catfish” Jack Clampit and his daughter, Amanda, love hand-grabbing catfish, so he and Amanda are searching for a camp that will accommodate both their families…and their appetite for catfish.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Starter Homes
programme.desc: Josh McIntire is an avid duck hunter and fisherman and he hopes to find a house where he can do just that. He’s bringing his life-long best friend, Hanna, for guidance.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Rolling on the River
programme.desc: Bryan Fassbender and Stephanie Robichaux are self described work-a-holics who just want to have a weekend houseboat on the Pearl River, and are willing to live off the grid.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Boaters Beware
programme.desc: Matt and Laurie aren’t your ordinary couple looking for a turnkey home. They love fixing places up. They look at three unusual homes on Louisiana oxbows.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Storm Deals
programme.desc: David and Jackie love bayou life in Mississippi. With their two sons away at college, they’re looking to downsize on the water. They’re looking for a fixer upper they can make their own.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Hurricane Homes
programme.desc: Jeff and Amelia Harding cruise the Mississippi Gulf Coast in search of a new house. Amelia lost her home in Katrina, so they’re scouring the coast for a house that can stand up to a hurricane.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Beaches vs. Bayous
programme.desc: CJ, who grew up on a shrimp boat in Louisiana, and Marty, from Los Angeles, are looking for a weekend getaway but can’t agree whether it will be on the bayou or the beach.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Airboat Homes
programme.desc: They’re big, loud, fast and can traverse anything. Airboats aren’t just a novelty in Louisiana, they’re essential—join the Fradellas as they search for an airboat accessible home.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Louisiana Luxury
programme.desc: Larry and Amber Douglas started a business that has become a million-dollar operation. They’re looking to upgrade their lifestyle, but still want a place with a down home bayou feel.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Cruisin For A Bruisin
programme.desc: Join Jill and Marvin as they comb Belle River for the perfect floating home—something that’ll get them back in the swamps and back to their bayou roots.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Bayou Baby
programme.desc: Chris and Jessica are going back to their roots and looking for a bayou home near Houma, Louisiana. But with a rambunctious baby, finding the perfect waterfront home can be a challenge.

programme.title: Baywatch: Baywatch Down Under, Part 1
programme.desc: After Mitch's lifeguard buddy's ex-wife dies in Australia, Mitch and the team accompany him on a trip down under to meet the son he's never known.

programme.title: Baywatch: Baywatch Down Under, Part 2
programme.desc: While team Baywatch prepares to compete against the Australian guards, Jake must choose between staying down under with his son or returning home. The competing lifeguards must put their intense rivalry aside to save a life.

programme.title: Baywatch: Water Dance
programme.desc: Cody learns a lesson in love when he and Mitch help a troubled violinist escape her dangerously overbearing mentor with a secret agenda. Meanwhile, Alex sets out to prove her worth at Baywatch by retaking the grueling rookie test with Jessie.

programme.title: Baywatch: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: Alex tries to save a diamond smuggler whose partners want him to "sleep with the fishes." Neely makes Hobie a tempting offer that divides the Buchannon household.

programme.title: Baywatch: Wave Rage
programme.desc: After Manny suffers a life-altering injury during a rescue, April tries to save him from himself. Neely meets her match in Alex when she tries to discredit Mitch.

programme.title: Baywatch: Galaxy Girls
programme.desc: April and Jessie search for the perfect celebrity host for a seaside beauty contest. Mitch and Alex help Manny adjust to his paralysis.

programme.title: Baywatch: Castles in the Sand
programme.desc: Alex's search for the creator of several elaborate sand castles is interrupted when she gets stuck entertaining her best friend's fiancée, who falls madly for Mitch. Cody loses his cool when his new boat is stolen while he's scuba diving with Newmie.

programme.title: Baywatch: Panic at Malibu Pier
programme.desc: Craig rescues a woman that develops a fatal attraction to him, placing Craig's wife in mortal danger. A fishing trip goes horribly wrong when the boat explodes and Mitch and his mentor Al have to rescue its passengers, including Mitch’s son Hobie.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8126
programme.desc: Thomas convinces Douglas to propose to Hope as if it were his own idea. Steffy does her best to comfort Liam as he recalls his last Fourth of July with Hope.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8127
programme.desc: Douglas asks a bewildered Hope to marry Thomas and be his new mommy. Fearing that Thomas is hiding something, Xander goes to Charlie for a favor.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8128
programme.desc: Thomas manipulates Hope into accepting his proposal. Xander increases his pursuit for evidence against Thomas.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8129
programme.desc: Zoe shocks Xander by defending Thomas from Xander’s slanderous accusations. Liam is stunned by the news of Thomas and Hope’s engagement.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8130
programme.desc: Xander puts his life in danger and confronts Thomas about the murder of Emma. Liam expresses his true love for Hope in anticipation that she will change her mind.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8131
programme.desc: Zoe and Xander’s relationship is on the line when Xander issues Zoe an ultimatum. Brooke does everything in her power to keep Hope from marrying Thomas.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8132
programme.desc: Sally makes Flo run errands at Forrester so she can be alone with Wyatt. Thomas plays a trick on Hope to get her to move up the wedding date.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8133
programme.desc: Ridge makes a large request of Brooke in regards to Thomas. Thomas’ trickery of Douglas causes Hope to make a flash decision.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8134
programme.desc: Liam struggles when Hope announces her updated plans to marry Thomas. Emotions run high as Hope and Thomas ask family and friends to be a part of their ceremony.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8135
programme.desc: Brooke gives Ridge an earful when he calls her out for hating that Thomas is marrying Hope. On the eve of her wedding day, Liam recalls his best memories with Hope.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8136
programme.desc: Thomas warns Ridge to tell Brooke to stop interfering in his plans. As friends and family gather to witness Thomas and Hope say I Do, Hope considers her options.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8137
programme.desc: Liam and Thomas bicker about why Hope has not yet made her bridal entrance. Zoe panics when Flo drunkenly states that there is still time to stop the wedding and tell the truth about baby Beth.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8138
programme.desc: Hope contemplates her next move after Phoebe interrupts her vows with Thomas. Liam becomes alarmed after overhearing a private conversation between Thomas and Flo.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8139
programme.desc: Pressured by his father, Douglas encourages Hope to spend the night with Thomas. Determined to learn the truth, Liam begs Wyatt to help him find out what Thomas and Flo are hiding.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8140
programme.desc: Wyatt is shocked when Flo accidentally reveals a crucial fact about her past. Brooke comforts Hope who still feels incomplete without her baby, Beth.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8141
programme.desc: Liam has Steffy tell him the story of Phoebe after she finds him looking at her adoption papers. Hope becomes unsettled when Thomas reveals his plans for their staycation.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8142
programme.desc: Flo reveals to Zoe that Thomas threatened her life if she tells the truth about Beth. While listening to Steffy, Liam continues to try and put the pieces of the puzzle together.

programme.title: The Last Man on Earth
programme.desc: When a disease turns all of humanity into the living dead, the last man on earth becomes a reluctant vampire hunter.

programme.title: Incident in a Ghostland
programme.desc: When Beth receives a call from her sister Vera, apparently in a state of extreme distress, she is prompted to return to her isolated family home...

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois to kill again. Starring: Donald Pleasence, Jamie Lee Curtis, Tony Moran

programme.title: Along Came the Devil
programme.desc: While in her old hometown she has visions of her deceased mother, driving her to contact the spirit world. Ashley unknowingly unearths a demonic force, which leaves her loved ones fighting for her soul.
